'undefined' : _typeof(logFieldMap)) === 'object') {\n      logFieldMap.index = String(index);\n      logFieldMap.itemId = itemId;\n\n      nude = encodeURIComponent(JSON.stringify(logFieldMap));\n    } else if (typeof logFieldMap === 'string') {\n      nude = encodeURIComponent(logFieldMap);\n    } else {\n      nude = encodeURIComponent(String(logFieldMap));\n    }\n\n    // 如果有Ico 并且原价大于等于10000 不展示原价\n    if (oIcoDom && oldPrice > 9999) {\n      oldPrice = '';\n    }\n\n    // 根据外传模式展示 RecExc的位置\n    var oIcoDom_sub = '';\n    if (recType === '0') {\n      txtRecExc = extMap.recExc;\n template.oTitle(title, null, classed);\n    oImgDom = template.oImgDom(targetUrl, picUrl, index, defaultUrl, dataSize);\n\n    if (type === '5' || type === '6') {\n      oAdAct =      }\n      option += '<option value=\"' + (i + 1) + '\">第' + (i + 1) + '页</option>';\n    }\n\n    return '\\n      <div class=\"lib-rates-pages\" type=\"' + type + '\" ratetype=\"' + rateType + '\">\\n        <div class=\"rates_pages_pre disable\">\\u4E0A\\u4E00\\u9875</div>\\n        <div class=\"rates_pages_btn\">\\n          <select class=\"rates_pages_select\">\\n            ' + option + '\\n          </select>\\n        </div>\\n        <div class=\"rates_pages_next\">\\u4E0B\\u4E00\\u9875</div>\\n      </div>\\n    ';\n  },\n  rate_tag: function rate_tag(data, type) {\n    return '\\n      <div class=\"lib-rates-tags\">\\n        <ul>\\n          ' + this.rate_tag_li(data, type) + '\\n        </ul>\\n      </div>\\n    ';\n  },\n\n  rate_tag_li: function rate_tag_li(data, type) {\n    var feedAllCount = data.feedAllCount || 0; //全部\n    var feedGoodCount = data.feedGoodCount || 0; //好评\n    var feedNormalCount = data.feedNormalCount || 0; //中评\n    var feedBadCount = data.feedBadCount || 0; //差评\n\n    var feedAllCountClassed = '';\n    var feedGoodCountClassed = '';\n    var feedNormalCountClassed = '';\n    var feedBadCountClassed = '';\n\n    if (type === 'feedAllCount') {\n      feedAllCountClassed = 'cur';\n    } else if (type === 'feedGoodCount') {\n      feedGoodCountClassed = 'cur';\n    } else if (type === 'feedNormalCount') {\n      feedNormalCountClassed = 'cur';\n    } else if (type === 'feedBadCount') {\n      feedBadCountClassed = 'cur';\n    } else {\n      feedAllCountClassed = 'cur';\n    }\n    return '\\n      <li class=\"rates_tag_feedAllCount ' + feedAllCountClassed + '\" type=\"feedAllCount\" ratetype=\"\">\\u5168\\u90E8</li>\\n      <li class=\"rates_tag_feedGoodCount ' + feedGoodCountClassed + '\" _s(feedBadCount) + ')</li>\\n    ';\n  },\n\n  rate_header: function rate_header(data) {\n    var feedbackDate = data.feedbackDate;\n    var headPicUrl = data.headPicUrl;\n    var userNick = className: tabSel_0, onClick: this.tabClickHandler.bind(null, '0'), ref: 'detailDesc' },\n                        '图文详情'\n                    ),\n                    React.createElement(\n                        'li',\n                        { className: tabSel_1, onClick: this.tabClickHandler.bind(null, '1') },\n                        '产品参数'\n                    ),\n                    React.createElement(\n                        'li',\n                        { className: tabSel_2, onClick: this.tabClickHandler.bind(null, '2') },\n                        '店铺推荐'\n                    )\n                )\n            ),\n            React.createElement(\n                'div',\n                { className: 'd-tabBox' },\n                React.createElement('div', { className: \"itemPhotoDetail \" + tabBoxSel_0 }),\n                React.createElement(\n                    'div',\n                    { className: \"itemIntroduce \" + tabBoxSel_1 },\n                    this.getIntroduce(data)\n                ),\n                React.createElement(\n                    'div',\n                    { className: \"shopRecommends \" + tabBoxSel_2 },\n                    React.createElement('div', { className: 'J_recommendCont' })\n                )\n            )\n        );\n    }\n});\n\nmodule.exports = TabContent;\n\n/*****************\n ** WEBPACK FOOTER\n ** ./src/js/components/tabContent.react.js\n ** module id = 2\n ** module chunks = 0\n **/\n//# sourceURL=webpack:///./src/js/components/tabContent.react.js?")},function(module,exports,__webpack_require__){eval("'use strict';\n\nvar AppDispatcher = __webpack_require__(4);\nvar actionType = __webpack_require__(8);\n\nvar AppActions = {\n    consumerProtectionClick: function consumerProtectionClick(params) {\n        AppDispatcher.dispatch({\n            actionType: actionType.CPCLICK,\n            params: params\n        });\n    },\n    chooseSkuClick: function chooseSkuClick(params) {\n        AppDispatcher.dispatch({\n            actionType: actionType.CHOOSECLICK,\n            params: params\n        });\n    }\n};\n\nmodule.exports = AppActions;\n\n/*****************\n ** WEBPACK FOOTER\n ** ./src/js/actions/AppActions.js\n ** module id = 3\n ** module chunks = 0\n **/\n//# sourceURL=webpack:///./src/js/actions/AppActions.js?")},function(module,exports,__webpack_require__){eval("/*\n * Copyright (c) 2014-2015, Facebook, Inc.\n * All rights reserved.\n *\n * This source code is licensed under the BSD-style license found in the\n * LICENSE file in the root directory of this source tree. An additional grant\n * of patent rights can be found in the PATENTS file in the same directory.\n *\n * AppDispatcher\n *\n * A singleton that operates as the central hub for application updates.\n */\n\n'use strict';\n\nvar Dispatcher = __webpack_require__(5).Dispatcher;\n\nmodule.exports = new Dispatcher();\n\n/*****************\n ** WEBPACK FOOTER\n ** ./src/js/dispatcher/AppDispatcher.js\n ** module id = 4\n ** module chunks = 0\n **/\n//# sourceURL=webpack:///./src/js/dispatcher/AppDispatcher.js?")},function(module,exports,__webpack_require__){eval("/**\n * Copyright (c) 2014-2015, Facebook, Inc.\n * All rights reserved.\n *\n * This source code is licensed under the BSD-style license found in the\n * LICENSE file in the root directory of this source tree. An additional grant\n * of patent rights can be found in the PATENTS file in the same directory.\n */\n\n'use strict';\n\nmodule.exports.Dispatcher = __webpack_require__(6);\n\n/*****************\n ** WEBPACK FOOTER\n ** ./~/flux/index.js\n ** module id = 5\n ** module chunks = 0\n **/\n//# sourceURL=webpack:///./~/flux/index.js?")},function(module,exports,__webpack_require__){eval("/*\n * Copyright (c) 2014, Facebook, Inc.\n * All rights reserved.\n *\n * This source code is licensed under the BSD-style license found in the\n * LICENSE file in the root directory of this source tree. An additional grant\n * of patent rights can be found in the PATENTS file in the same directory.\n *\n * @providesModule Dispatcher\n * @typechecks\n */\n\n\"use strict\";\n\nvar invariant = __webpack_require__(7);\n\nvar _lastID = 1;\nvar _prefix = 'ID_';\n\n/**\n * Dispatcher is used to broadcast payloads to registered callbacks. This is\n * different from generic pub-sub systems in two ways:\n *\n *   1) Callbacks are not subscribed to particular events. Every payload is\n *      dispatched to every registered callback.\n *   2) Callbacks can be deferred in whole or part until other callbacks have\n *      been executed.\n *\n * For example, consider this hypothetical flight destination form, which\n * selects a default city when a country is selected:\n *\n *   var flightDispatcher = new Dispatcher();\n *\n *   // Keeps track of which country is selected\n *   var CountryStore = {country: null};\n *\n *   // Keeps track of which city is selected\n *   var CityStore = {city: null};\n *\n *   // Keeps track of the base flight price of the selected city\n *   var FlightPriceStore = {price: null}\n *\n * When a user changes the selected city, we dispatch the payload:\n *\n *   flightDispatcher.dispatch({\n *     actionType: 'city-update',\n *     selectedCity: 'paris'\n *   });\n *\n * This payload is digested by `CityStore`:\n *\n *   flightDispatcher.register(function(payload) {\n *     if (payload.actionType === 'city-update') {\n *       CityStore.city = payload.selectedCity;\n *     }\n *   });\n *\n * When the user selects a country, we dispatch the payload:\n *\n *   flightDispatcher.dispatch({\n *     actionType: 'country-update',\n *     selectedCountry: 'australia'\n *   });\n *\n * This payload is digested by both stores:\n *\n *    CountryStore.dispatchToken = flightDispatcher.register(function(payload) {\n *     if (payload.actionType === 'country-update') {\n *       CountryStore.country = payload.selectedCountry;\n *     }\n *   });\n *\n * When the callback to update `CountryStore` is registered, we save a reference\n * to the returned token. Using this token with `waitFor()`, we can guarantee\n * that `CountryStore` is updated before the callback that updates `CityStore`\n * needs to query its data.\n *\n *   CityStore.dispatchToken = flightDispatcher.register(function(payload) {\n *     if (payload.actionType === 'country-update') {\n *       // `CountryStore.country` may not be updated.\n *       flightDispatcher.waitFor([CountryStore.dispatchToken]);\n *       // `CountryStore.country` is now guaranteed to be updated.\n *\n *       // Select the default city for the new country\n *       CityStore.city = getDefaultCityForCountry(CountryStore.country);\n *     }\n *   });\n *\n * The usage of `waitFor()` can be chained, for example:\n *\n *   FlightPriceStore.dispatchToken =\n *     flightDispatcher.register(function(payload) {\n *       switch (payload.actionType) {\n *         case 'country-update':\n *           flightDispatcher.waitFor([CityStore.dispatchToken]);\n *           FlightPriceStore.price =\n *             getFlightPriceStore(CountryStore.country, CityStore.city);\n *           break;\n *\n *         case 'city-update':\n *           FlightPriceStore.price =\n *             FlightPriceStore(CountryStore.country, CityStore.city);\n *           break;\n *     }\n *   });\n *\n * The `country-update` payload will be guaranteed to invoke the stores'\n * registered callbacks in order: `CountryStore`, `CityStore`, then\n * `FlightPriceStore`.\n */\n\nfunction Dispatcher() {\n  this.$Dispatcher_callbacks = {};\n  this.$Dispatcher_isPending = {};\n  this.$Dispatcher_isHandled = {};\n  this.$Dispatcher_isDispatching = false;\n  this.$Dispatcher_pendingPayload = null;\n}\n\n/**\n * Registers a callback to be invoked with every dispatched payload. Returns\n * a token that can be used with `waitFor()`.\n *\n * @param {function} callback\n * @return {string}\n */\nDispatcher.prototype.register = function (callback) {\n  var id = _prefix + _lastID++;\n  this.$Dispatcher_callbacks[id] = callback;\n  return id;\n};\n\n/**\n * Removes a callback based on its token.\n *\n * @param {string} id\n */\nDispatcher.prototype.unregister = function (id) {\n  invariant(this.$Dispatcher_callbacks[id], 'Dispatcher.unregister(...): `%s` does not map to a registered callback.', id);\n  delete this.$Dispatcher_callbacks[id];\n};\n\n/**\n * Waits for the callbacks specified to be invoked before continuing execution\n * of the current callback. This method should only be used by a callback in\n * response to a dispatched payload.\n *\n * @param {array<string>} ids\n */\nDispatcher.prototype.waitFor = function (ids) {\n  invariant(this.$Dispatcher_isDispatching, 'Dispatcher.waitFor(...): Must be invoked while dispatching.');\n  for (var ii = 0; ii < ids.length; ii++) {\n    var id = ids[ii];\n    if (this.$Dispatcher_isPending[id]) {\n      invariant(this.$Dispatcher_isHandled[id], 'Dispatcher.waitFor(...): Circular dependency detected while ' + 'waiting for `%s`.', id);\n      continue;\n    }\n    invariant(this.$Dispatcher_callbacks[id], 'Dispatcher.waitFor(...): `%s` does not map to a registered callback.', id);\n    this.$Dispatcher_invokeCallback(id);\n  }\n};\n\n/**\n * Dispatches a payload to all registered callbacks.\n *\n * @param {object} payload\n */\nDispatcher.prototype.dispatch = function (payload) {\n  invariant(!this.$Dispatcher_isDispatching, 'Dispatch.dispatch(...): Cannot dispatch in the middle of a dispatch.');\n  this.$Dispatcher_startDispatching(payload);\n  try {\n    for (var id in this.$Dispatcher_callbacks) {\n      if (this.$Dispatcher_isPending[id]) {\n        continue;\n      }\n      this.$Dispatcher_invokeCallback(id);\n    }\n  } finally {\n    this.$Dispatcher_stopDispatching();\n  }\n};\n\n/**\n * Is this Dispatcher currently dispatching.\n *\n * @return {boolean}\n */\nDispatcher.prototype.isDispatching = function () {\n  return this.$Dispatcher_isDispatching;\n};\n\n/**\n * Call the callback stored with the given id. Also do some internal\n * bookkeeping.\n *\n * @param {string} id\n * @internal\n */\nDispatcher.prototype.$Dispatcher_invokeCallback = function (id) {\n  this.$Dispatcher_isPending[id] = true;\n  this.$Dispatcher_callbacks[id](this.$Dispatcher_pendingPayload);\n  this.$Dispatcher_isHandled[id] = true;\n};\n\n/**\n * Set up bookkeeping needed when dispatching.\n *\n * @param {object} payload\n * @internal\n */\nDispatcher.prototype.$Dispatcher_startDispatching = function (payload) {\n  for (var id in this.$Dispatcher_callbacks) {\n    this.$Dispatcher_isPending[id] = false;\n    this.$Dispatcher_isHandled[id] = false;\n  }\n  this.$Dispatcher_pendingPayload = payload;\n  this.$Dispatcher_isDispatching = true;\n};\n\n/**\n * Clear bookkeeping used for dispatching.\n *\n * @internal\n */\nDispatcher.prototype.$Dispatcher_stopDispatching = function () {\n  this.$Dispatcher_pendingPayload = null;\n  this.$Dispatcher_isDispatching = false;\n};\n\nmodule.exports = Dispatcher;\n\n/*****************\n ** WEBPACK FOOTER\n ** ./~/flux/lib/Dispatcher.js\n ** module id = 6\n ** module chunks = 0\n **/\n//# sourceURL=webpack:///./~/flux/lib/Dispatcher.js?")},function(module,exports){eval("/**\n * Copyright (c) 2014, Facebook, Inc.\n * All rights reserved.\n *\n * This source code is licensed under the BSD-style license found in the\n * LICENSE file in the root directory of this source tree. An additional grant\n * of patent rights can be found in the PATENTS file in the same directory.\n *\n * @providesModule invariant\n */\n\n\"use strict\";\n\n/**\n * Use invariant() to assert state which your program assumes to be true.\n *\n * Provide sprintf-style format (only %s is supported) and arguments\n * to provide information about what broke and what you were\n * expecting.\n *\n * The invariant message will be stripped in production, but the invariant\n * will remain to ensure logic does not differ in production.\n */\n\nvar invariant = function invariant(condition, format, a, b, c, d, e, f) {\n  if (false) {\n    if (format === undefined) {\n      throw new Error('invariant requires an error message argument');\n    }\n  }\n\n  if (!condition) {\n    var error;\n    if (format === undefined) {\n      error = new Error('Minified exception occurred; use the non-minified dev environment ' + 'for the full error message and additional helpful warnings.');\n    } else {\n      var args = [a, b, c, d, e, f];\n      var argIndex = 0;\n      error = new Error('Invariant Violation: ' + format.replace(/%s/g, function () {\n        return args[argIndex++];\n      }));\n    }\n\n    error.framesToPop = 1; // we don't care about invariant's own frame\n    throw error;\n  }\n};\n\nmodule.exports = invariant;\n\n/*****************\n ** WEBPACK FOOTER\n ** ./~/flux/lib/invariant.js\n ** module id = 7\n ** module chunks = 0\n **/\n//# sourceURL=webpack:///./~/flux/lib/invariant.js?")},function(module,exports){eval('"use strict";\n\nmodule.exports = {\n	CPCLICK: "consumerProtection_action",\n	CHOOSECLICK: "chooseSku_action"\n};\n\n/*****************\n ** WEBPACK FOOTER\n ** ./src/js/actions/ActionType.js\n ** module id = 8\n ** module chunks = 0\n **/\n//# sourceURL=webpack:///./src/js/actions/ActionType.js?')},function(module,exports,__webpack_require__){eval("'use strict';\n\nvar EventEmitter = __webpack_require__(11).EventEmitter;\nvar assign = __webpack_require__(12);\nvar AppDispatcher = __webpack_require__(4);\nvar actionType = __webpack_require__(8);\nvar SkuStores = __webpack_require__(13);\nvar PublicStores = __webpack_require__(14);\nvar MtopRequest = __webpack_require__(10);\nvar PublicDataStore = __webpack_require__(15);\nvar TemplateLayoutDefault = __webpack_require__(16);\nvar smartBannerHelper = __webpack_require__(17);\nvar Untils = __webpack_require__(18);\n\nvar DetailDesc = __webpack_require__(19);\n\nvar EVENT_CHANGE = 'store::change';\nvar AppStores = assign({}, EventEmitter.prototype, {\n    addChangeListener: function addChangeListener(callback, eventId) {\n        var id = undefined;\n        id = eventId ? eventId : '';\n        // console.log(id)\n        this.on(EVENT_CHANGE + id, callback);\n    },\n    removeChangeListener: function removeChangeListener(callback, eventId) {\n        var id = undefined;\n        id = eventId ? eventId : '';\n        this.removeListener(EVENT_CHANGE + id, callback);\n    },\n    emitChange: function emitChange(eventId) {\n        var id = undefined;\n        id = eventId ? eventId : '';\n        //console.log(id)\n        this.emit(EVENT_CHANGE + id);\n    }\n});\n\nvar pageData = {};\nvar imgHelper = PublicStores.getImgHelper;\nAppStores.pageData = pageData;\npageData.data = {\n    firstLoad: true,\n    loading: '正在加载',\n    pop: {},\n    skupop: {},\n    ratepop: {},\n    choosedSku: {},\n    temp_layout: {},\n    temp_component: {},\n    temp_action: {}\n};\n\nAppDispatcher.register(function (payload) {\n    var action = payload;\n    switch (action.actionType) {\n        case actionType.CPCLICK:\n            initFn.setConsumerProtectionHandler(action.params);\n            break;\n        case actionType.CHOOSECLICK:\n            initFn.setChooseSkuHandler(action.params);\n            break;\n        default:\n\n    }\n});\n\n//业务逻辑处理\nvar initFn = {\n\n    init: function init() {\n        this.start();\n    },\n    start: function start() {\n\n        //请求数据\n        this.getQuery();\n\n        // smartbanner\n        smartBannerHelper.active();\n    },\n    getQuery: function getQuery() {\n        var _this = this;\n\n        var that = this;\n\n        if (!lib.env.params.id) {\n            var msg = '缺少参数';\n            this.setErrData('', msg);\n            return;\n        }\n\n        //请求数据\n        MtopRequest.getDetail().then(function (response) {\n            var data = response.data;\n            var apiStack = data.apiStack && data.apiStack.length ? data.apiStack[0] : {};\n            var apiStackValue = apiStack.value ? JSON.parse(apiStack.value) : data.mockData ? JSON.parse(data.mockData) : {};\n\n            data = PublicStores.extend(data, apiStackValue);\n\n            var isDegrade = that.getDegradation(data);\n\n            that.tbk(data);\n            that.getDetailTemp(data);\n            that.setAplus(data);\n\n            if (!isDegrade) {\n                return false;\n            }\n            pageData.data['firstLoad'] = false;\n            pageData.data['data'] = data;\n\n            AppStores.emitChange();\n        }, function (result) {\n            var ret = result.ret[0];\n            var code = ret.split('::')[0];\n            var msg = ret.split('::')[1];\n\n            var captchaCheckUrl = result.data ? result.data.redirectUrl : '';\n            if (ret === 'ERRCODE_QUERY_DETAIL_FAIL::checkcode' && captchaCheckUrl) {\n                goCaptcha(captchaCheckUrl);\n            } else {\n                that.setErrData(msg);\n            }\n        })['catch'](function (err) {\n            Untils.trackLog({\n                msg: 'wdetail_catch:' + JSON.stringify(err)\n            });\n            _this.setErrData();\n        }).then(function (res) {\n            var params = {\n                item_num_id: lib.env.params.id,\n                type: '0'\n            };\n            return MtopRequest.getdescDetail_old(params).then(function (response) {\n                return response;\n            }, function (json) {\n                var ret = json.ret[0];\n                var msg = ret.split('::')[1];\n                Untils.trackLog({\n                    msg: 'getdescDetail_old:' + msg\n                });\n                return json;\n            });\n        }).then(function (json) {\n            var data = json.data || {};\n            var images = data.images;\n\n            var oDetailDesc = document.body.querySelector('.itemPhotoDetail');\n            if (oDetailDesc) {\n                React.render(React.createElement(DetailDesc, { data: json.data }), oDetailDesc);\n            }\n        });\n\n        // 验证逻辑 旧逻辑\n        function goCaptcha(captchaCheckUrl) {\n            var targetURL, updatePart;\n            updatePart = \"&back=\" + encodeURIComponent(window.location) + \"&\";\n            targetURL = captchaCheckUrl.replace(/http_referer[^&]+$/, updatePart).replace(/http_referer.+?&/, updatePart).replace(\"&&\", \"&\");\n            return window.location.replace(targetURL);\n        };\n    },\n    //走降级\n    getDegradation: function getDegradation(data) {\n        var that = this;\n        var isnotDegrade = true;\n\n        var trade = data.trade || {};\n        var redirectUrl = trade.redirectUrl;\n\n        if (redirectUrl) {\n            var httpUrl = lib.httpurl(redirectUrl);\n            var redirectUrlParams = httpUrl.params;\n            var envParams = lib.env.params;\n            var params = PublicStores.extend(envParams, redirectUrlParams);\n            var pathname = httpUrl.pathname;\n            httpUrl.params = params;\n            //httpUrl.params.spm = PublicStores.getSpmUrl();\n\n            // /awp/core/detail.htm 线上详情的pathname  /detail/rc/index.html新详情测试地址的pathname\n            if (pathname !== '/awp/core/detail.htm' && pathname !== '/awp/core/index.htm' && pathname !== '/detail/rc/index.html') {\n                var url = httpUrl.toString();\n                location.replace(url);\n                isnotDegrade = false;\n                return;\n            }\n        }\n\n        // B类商品降级\n        if (data.seller && data.seller.shopType === 'B') {\n            var url = ['//detail.', lib.mtop.config.subDomain, '.tmall.com/item.htm', window.location.search].join('');\n            location.replace(url);\n            isnotDegrade = false;\n            return;\n        }\n\n        return isnotDegrade;\n    },\n\n    getDetailTemp: function getDetailTemp(data) {\n\n        var temp_layout = TemplateLayoutDefault.temp_layout;\n        var temp_component = TemplateLayoutDefault.temp_component;\n        var temp_action = TemplateLayoutDefault.temp_action;\n\n        var tempStorage = this.getStorageTemp(data);\n\n        if (tempStorage.layout) {\n            temp_layout = tempStorage.layout;\n        }\n        if (tempStorage.actionConfig) {\n            temp_action = tempStorage.actionConfig;\n        }\n        if (tempStorage.componentConfig) {\n            temp_component = tempStorage.componentConfig;\n        }\n\n        pageData.data.temp_layout = temp_layout;\n        pageData.data.temp_component = temp_component;\n        pageData.data.temp_action = temp_action;\n\n        this.setStorageTemp(data);\n    },\n\n    getStorageTemp: function getStorageTemp(data) {\n        var layout = data.layout || {};\n        var layoutId = layout.layoutId;\n        var config = layout.config || {};\n        var dependActionConfigID = config.dependActionConfigID;\n        var dependComponentConfigID = config.dependComponentConfigID;\n        var dependThemeConfigID = config.dependThemeConfigID;\n\n        if (!window.localStorage) {\n            return {};\n        }\n\n        var storageData = {};\n        var storage_layoutId = localStorage.getItem('detailLayoutID');\n        var storage_ActionId = localStorage.getItem('dependActionConfigID');\n        var storage_ComponentId = localStorage.getItem('dependComponentConfigID');\n\n        var storage_LayoutData = localStorage.getItem(layoutId);\n        var storage_ActionData = localStorage.getItem(dependActionConfigID);\n        var storage_ComponentData = localStorage.getItem(dependComponentConfigID);\n\n        if (storage_LayoutData && storage_LayoutData !== '{}') {\n            try {\n                storageData.layout = JSON.parse(storage_LayoutData);\n            } catch (err) {\n                console.log('storage_LayoutData is error');\n            }\n        }\n        if (storage_ActionData && storage_ActionData !== '{}') {\n            try {\n                storageData.actionConfig = JSON.parse(storage_ActionData);\n            } catch (err) {\n                console.log('storage_ActionData is error');\n            }\n        }\n        if (storage_ComponentData && storage_ComponentData !== '{}') {\n            try {\n                storageData.componentConfig = JSON.parse(storage_ComponentData);\n            } catch (err) {\n                console.log('storage_ComponentData is error');\n            }\n        }\n\n        return storageData;\n    },\n\n    setStorageTemp: function setStorageTemp(data) {\n        if (!window.localStorage || !data.layout) {\n            return;\n        }\n\n        var temp_url = lib.mtop.config.subDomain === 'waptest' ? '//d.daily.taobaocdn.net/L0/avengers/component/' : '//down.alicdn.com/L0/avengers/component/';\n        var layout = data.layout || {};\n        var layoutId = layout.layoutId;\n        var config = layout.config || {};\n        var dependActionConfigID = config.dependActionConfigID;\n        var dependComponentConfigID = config.dependComponentConfigID;\n        var dependThemeConfigID = config.dependThemeConfigID;\n\n        var storage_layoutId = localStorage.getItem('detailLayoutID');\n        var storage_actionId = localStorage.getItem('dependActionConfigID');\n        var storage_componentId = localStorage.getItem('dependComponentConfigID');\n\n        var storage_layoutIdTemp = localStorage.getItem(storage_layoutId);\n        var storage_actionIdTemp = localStorage.getItem(storage_actionId);\n        var storage_componentIdTemp = localStorage.getItem(storage_componentId);\n\n        if (storage_layoutId !== layoutId || !storage_layoutIdTemp) {\n\n            appendScript(layoutId, 'detailTemplateLayout', function () {\n                Untils.setLocalStorage('detailLayoutID', layoutId);\n            }, function () {\n                if (localStorage.getItem('detailLayoutID') === layoutId) {\n                    localStorage.removeItem('detailLayoutID');\n                }\n            });\n        }\n\n        if (storage_actionId !== dependActionConfigID || !storage_actionIdTemp) {\n\n            appendScript(dependActionConfigID, 'detailTemplateAction', function () {\n                Untils.setLocalStorage('dependActionConfigID', dependActionConfigID);\n            }, function () {\n                if (localStorage.getItem('dependActionConfigID') === dependActionConfigID) {\n                    localStorage.removeItem('dependActionConfigID');\n                }\n            });\n        }\n\n        if (storage_componentId !== dependComponentConfigID || !storage_componentIdTemp) {\n\n            appendScript(dependComponentConfigID, 'detailTemplateComponent', function () {\n                Untils.setLocalStorage('dependComponentConfigID', dependComponentConfigID);\n            }, function () {\n                if (localStorage.getItem('dependComponentConfigID') === dependComponentConfigID) {\n                    localStorage.removeItem('dependComponentConfigID');\n                }\n            });\n        }\n\n        function appendScript(id, str, success, error) {\n            if (!(id && id !== 'undefined' && id !== undefined)) {\n                return;\n            }\n            var layoutScript = document.createElement('script');\n            layoutScript.src = temp_url + id;\n            layoutScript.charset = \"UTF-8\";\n\n            layoutScript.onload = function () {\n\n                success && success();\n\n                if (window[str] && typeof window[str] === 'function') {\n                    var layoutTemp = window[str]();\n                    if (layoutTemp && typeof layoutTemp === 'object') {\n                        var layoutTempStr = JSON.stringify(layoutTemp);\n                        if (layoutTempStr !== '{}') {\n                            Untils.setLocalStorage(id, layoutTempStr);\n                        }\n                    }\n                }\n            };\n\n            layoutScript.onerror = function () {\n                error && error();\n            };\n\n            document.body.appendChild(layoutScript);\n        }\n    },\n\n    /**\n     * 更改数据-进入出错逻辑的DOM展示\n     * @func text\n     * @param  {string} message 展示文案\n     * @return \n     */\n    setErrData: function setErrData(message, title, btn) {\n        var that = this;\n        pageData.data.firstLoad = false;\n        pageData.data.errData = {\n            title: title,\n            sub: message,\n            btn: btn\n        };\n        Untils.trackLog({\n            msg: message || title || 'catch_wdetail'\n        });\n        AppStores.emitChange();\n    },\n\n    setLoginData: function setLoginData() {\n        var that = this;\n        that.setErrData('登陆失效', '登录帐号才能看到购物车哦', {\n            name: \"马上登陆\",\n            handler: function handler() {\n                MtopRequest.goLoginAsync().then(function () {}, function (json) {\n                    that.setFails(json);\n                });\n            }\n        });\n    },\n\n    setFails: function setFails(json) {\n        var that = this;\n        var ret = json.ret[0];\n        var retRep = ret && ret.split('::');\n        var code = retRep && retRep[0];\n        var msg = retRep && retRep[1];\n\n        //登录\n        if (json && json.ret && json.retType === lib.mtop.RESPONSE_TYPE.SESSION_EXPIRED) {\n            //lib.login.goLogin()\n            MtopRequest.lib.login.goLoginAsync().then(function () {}, function (json) {\n                that.setFails(json);\n            });\n        } else if (code === 'SESSION_ASYNC') {\n            that.setLoginData();\n        } else {\n            this.setErrData(msg);\n        }\n    },\n\n    errorNotifPop: function errorNotifPop(response) {\n        //提示\n        var ret = response.ret[0];\n        var retRep = ret.split('::');\n        var code = retRep[0];\n        var msg = retRep[1] && code !== 'ABORT' ? retRep[1] : '小二很忙,请稍后重试';\n\n        lib.notification.simple(msg);\n    },\n\n    setConsumerProtectionHandler: function setConsumerProtectionHandler(params) {\n\n pageData.data.data,\n                callBack: function callBack(res) {\n                    console.log(res);\n                }\n            }\n        };\n seller.shopType;\n        var sellerType = seller.sellerType;\n        var shopId = seller.shopId;\n        var brandValueId = item.brandValueId;\n        var categoryId = item.categoryId;\n        var rootCategoryId = item.rootCategoryId;\n        var itemId = item.itemId;\n        var params = data.params || {};\n        var trackParams = params.trackParams || {};\n\n        var at_isb = '';\n\n        if (shopType === 'C') {\n            at_isb = '0';\n        } else if (shopType === 'B') {\n            at_isb = '1';\n        } else {\n            at_isb = '';\n        }\n\n         for (var key in trackParams) {\n                paramsStr += key + '=' + trackParams[key] + '&';\n            }\n            window.goldlog.record('/mtrade.detail.wdetail_entry', 'EXP', paramsStr, 'H1484266099');\n        }\n    },\n    // 淘客打点\n    tbk: function tbk(data) {\n\n        var seller = data.seller || {};\n        var sellerType = seller.sellerType;\n        var userId = seller.userId;\n        var item = data.item || {};\n        var itemId = item.itemId;\n        var url = '//g.alicdn.com/mm/cps/trace.js';\n        var script = document.createElement('script');\n        script.src = url;\n        script.charset = \"UTF-8\";\n\n        script.onload = function () {\n            if (window.CPS && window.CPS.trace) {\n                window.CPS.trace({\n                    type: 2,\n                    subtype: sellerType === \"B\" ? 2 : 6,\n                    itemid: itemId,\n                    sellerid: userId\n                });\n            }\n        };\n ./src/js/stores/MtopRequest.js\n ** module id = 10\n ** module chunks = 0\n **/\n//# sourceURL=webpack:///./src/js/stores/MtopRequest.js?")},function(module,exports){eval("// Copyright Joyent, Inc. and other Node contributors.\n//\n// Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a\n// copy of this software and associated documentation files (the\n// \"Software\"), to deal in the Software without restriction, including\n// without limitation the rights to use, copy, modify, merge, publish,\n// distribute, sublicense, and/or sell copies of the Software, and to permit\n// persons to whom the Software is furnished to do so, subject to the\n// following conditions:\n//\n// The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included\n// in all copies or substantial portions of the Software.\n//\n// THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED \"AS IS\", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS\n// OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF\n// MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT. IN\n// NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM,\n// DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR\n// OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE\n// USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE.\n\n'use strict';\n\nfunction EventEmitter() {\n  this._events = this._events || {};\n  this._maxListeners = this._maxListeners || undefined;\n}\nmodule.exports = EventEmitter;\n\n// Backwards-compat with node 0.10.x\nEventEmitter.EventEmitter = EventEmitter;\n\nEventEmitter.prototype._events = undefined;\nEventEmitter.prototype._maxListeners = undefined;\n\n// By default EventEmitters will print a warning if more than 10 listeners are\n// added to it. This is a useful default which helps finding memory leaks.\nEventEmitter.defaultMaxListeners = 10;\n\n// Obviously not all Emitters should be limited to 10. This function allows\n// that to be increased. Set to zero for unlimited.\nEventEmitter.prototype.setMaxListeners = function (n) {\n  if (!isNumber(n) || n < 0 || isNaN(n)) throw TypeError('n must be a positive number');\n  this._maxListeners = n;\n  return this;\n};\n\nEventEmitter.prototype.emit = function (type) {\n  var er, handler, len, args, i, listeners;\n\n  if (!this._events) this._events = {};\n\n  // If there is no 'error' event listener then throw.\n  if (type === 'error') {\n    if (!this._events.error || isObject(this._events.error) && !this._events.error.length) {\n      er = arguments[1];\n      if (er instanceof Error) {\n        throw er; // Unhandled 'error' event\n      } else {\n          // At least give some kind of context to the user\n          var err = new Error('Uncaught, unspecified \"error\" event. (' + er + ')');\n          err.context = er;\n          throw err;\n        }\n    }\n  }\n\n  handler = this._events[type];\n\n  if (isUndefined(handler)) return false;\n\n  if (isFunction(handler)) {\n    switch (arguments.length) {\n      // fast cases\n      case 1:\n        handler.call(this);\n        break;\n      case 2:\n        handler.call(this, arguments[1]);\n        break;\n      case 3:\n        handler.call(this, arguments[1], arguments[2]);\n        break;\n      // slower\n      default:\n        args = Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments, 1);\n        handler.apply(this, args);\n    }\n  } else if (isObject(handler)) {\n    args = Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments, 1);\n    listeners = handler.slice();\n    len = listeners.length;\n    for (i = 0; i < len; i++) listeners[i].apply(this, args);\n  }\n\n  return true;\n};\n\nEventEmitter.prototype.addListener = function (type, listener) {\n  var m;\n\n  if (!isFunction(listener)) throw TypeError('listener must be a function');\n\n  if (!this._events) this._events = {};\n\n  // To avoid recursion in the case that type === \"newListener\"! Before\n  // adding it to the listeners, first emit \"newListener\".\n  if (this._events.newListener) this.emit('newListener', type, isFunction(listener.listener) ? listener.listener : listener);\n\n  if (!this._events[type])\n    // Optimize the case of one listener. Don't need the extra array object.\n    this._events[type] = listener;else if (isObject(this._events[type]))\n    // If we've already got an array, just append.\n    this._events[type].push(listener);else\n    // Adding the second element, need to change to array.\n    this._events[type] = [this._events[type], listener];\n\n  // Check for listener leak\n  if (isObject(this._events[type]) && !this._events[type].warned) {\n    if (!isUndefined(this._maxListeners)) {\n      m = this._maxListeners;\n    } else {\n      m = EventEmitter.defaultMaxListeners;\n    }\n\n    if (m && m > 0 && this._events[type].length > m) {\n      this._events[type].warned = true;\n      console.error('(node) warning: possible EventEmitter memory ' + 'leak detected. %d listeners added. ' + 'Use emitter.setMaxListeners() to increase limit.', this._events[type].length);\n      if (typeof console.trace === 'function') {\n        // not supported in IE 10\n        console.trace();\n      }\n    }\n  }\n\n  return this;\n};\n\nEventEmitter.prototype.on = EventEmitter.prototype.addListener;\n\nEventEmitter.prototype.once = function (type, listener) {\n  if (!isFunction(listener)) throw TypeError('listener must be a function');\n\n  var fired = false;\n\n  function g() {\n    this.removeListener(type, g);\n\n    if (!fired) {\n      fired = true;\n      listener.apply(this, arguments);\n    }\n  }\n\n  g.listener = listener;\n  this.on(type, g);\n\n  return this;\n};\n\n// emits a 'removeListener' event iff the listener was removed\nEventEmitter.prototype.removeListener = function (type, listener) {\n  var list, position, length, i;\n\n  if (!isFunction(listener)) throw TypeError('listener must be a function');\n\n  if (!this._events || !this._events[type]) return this;\n\n  list = this._events[type];\n  length = list.length;\n  position = -1;\n\n  if (list === listener || isFunction(list.listener) && list.listener === listener) {\n    delete this._events[type];\n    if (this._events.removeListener) this.emit('removeListener', type, listener);\n  } else if (isObject(list)) {\n    for (i = length; i-- > 0;) {\n      if (list[i] === listener || list[i].listener && list[i].listener === listener) {\n        position = i;\n        break;\n      }\n    }\n\n    if (position < 0) return this;\n\n    if (list.length === 1) {\n      list.length = 0;\n      delete this._events[type];\n    } else {\n      list.splice(position, 1);\n    }\n\n    if (this._events.removeListener) this.emit('removeListener', type, listener);\n  }\n\n  return this;\n};\n\nEventEmitter.prototype.removeAllListeners = function (type) {\n  var key, listeners;\n\n  if (!this._events) return this;\n\n  // not listening for removeListener, no need to emit\n  if (!this._events.removeListener) {\n    if (arguments.length === 0) this._events = {};else if (this._events[type]) delete this._events[type];\n    return this;\n  }\n\n  // emit removeListener for all listeners on all events\n  if (arguments.length === 0) {\n    for (key in this._events) {\n      if (key === 'removeListener') continue;\n      this.removeAllListeners(key);\n    }\n    this.removeAllListeners('removeListener');\n    this._events = {};\n    return this;\n  }\n\n  listeners = this._events[type];\n\n  if (isFunction(listeners)) {\n    this.removeListener(type, listeners);\n  } else if (listeners) {\n    // LIFO order\n    while (listeners.length) this.removeListener(type, listeners[listeners.length - 1]);\n  }\n  delete this._events[type];\n\n  return this;\n};\n\nEventEmitter.prototype.listeners = function (type) {\n  var ret;\n  if (!this._events || !this._events[type]) ret = [];else if (isFunction(this._events[type])) ret = [this._events[type]];else ret = this._events[type].slice();\n  return ret;\n};\n\nEventEmitter.prototype.listenerCount = function (type) {\n  if (this._events) {\n    var evlistener = this._events[type];\n\n    if (isFunction(evlistener)) return 1;else if (evlistener) return evlistener.length;\n  }\n  return 0;\n};\n\nEventEmitter.listenerCount = function (emitter, type) {\n  return emitter.listenerCount(type);\n};\n\nfunction isFunction(arg) {\n  return typeof arg === 'function';\n}\n\nfunction isNumber(arg) {\n  return typeof arg === 'number';\n}\n\nfunction isObject(arg) {\n  return typeof arg === 'object' && arg !== null;\n}\n\nfunction isUndefined(arg) {\n  return arg === void 0;\n}\n\n/*****************\n ** WEBPACK FOOTER\n ** ./~/.1.1.1@events/events.js\n ** module id = 11\n ** module chunks = 0\n **/\n//# sourceURL=webpack:///./~/.1.1.1@events/events.js?")},function(module,exports){eval("'use strict';\n\nfunction ToObject(val) {\n	if (val == null) {\n		throw new TypeError('Object.assign cannot be called with null or undefined');\n	}\n\n	return Object(val);\n}\n\nmodule.exports = Object.assign || function (target, source) {\n	var pendingException;\n	var from;\n	var keys;\n	var to = ToObject(target);\n\n	for (var s = 1; s < arguments.length; s++) {\n		from = arguments[s];\n		keys = Object.keys(Object(from));\n\n		for (var i = 0; i < keys.length; i++) {\n			try {\n				to[keys[i]] = from[keys[i]];\n			} catch (err) {\n				if (pendingException === undefined) {\n					pendingException = err;\n				}\n			}\n		}\n	}\n\n	if (pendingException) {\n		throw pendingException;\n	}\n\n	return to;\n};\n\n/*****************\n ** WEBPACK FOOTER\n ** ./~/object-assign/index.js\n ** module id = 12\n ** module chunks = 0\n **/\n//# sourceURL=webpack:///./~/object-assign/index.js?")},function(module,exports){eval("'use strict';\n\nvar timerClose = null;\nvar SkuStores = {\n    confirmSku: function confirmSku(opt, callback) {\n        var that = this;\n\n        lib.detail.model.fetch(opt.itemId, {\n            success: function success(result) {\n                that.initSku({\n                    data: result.originData,\n                    itemId: opt.itemId\n                }, callback);\n            },\n            error: function error(data) {\n                console.log(data);\n                var totast = data && data.ret && data.ret[0] && data.ret[0].split('::') && data.ret[0].split('::')[1];\n                lib.notification.simple(totast || '商品详情请求异常');\n            }\n        });\n    },\n    initSku: function initSku(params, callback) {\n        //给sku加事件\n        var ListSku = ctrl.sku;\n        var instance = new ListSku({\n            close: true\n        });\n        var skuDom = document.getElementById('J_sku'); //this.refs.sku.getDOMNode();\n\n        instance.viewModel = params.data;\n\n        //确认按钮执行事件\n        instance.addEventListener('sku:doConfirm', function (e) {\n            if (params.isCartGoods) {\n                window.location.href = //关闭sku view执行事件\n        instance.addEventListener('sku:close', function (e) {\n            e.cancelBubble = true;\n            clearTimeout(timerClose);\n            //timerClose = **/\n//# sourceURL=webpack:///./src/js/stores/SkuStores.js?")},function(module,exports){eval("/**\n    公用方法库\n*/\n\n'use strict';\n\nvar imgHelper = new lib.img({\n    'class': 'lazy', //图片class\n    'dataSrc': 'lib-img', //图片真实src 的data字段\n    'size': '200x200', //cdn尺寸\n    'sharpen': 's150', //锐化参数\n    'q': ['q50', 'q30'], //图片质量[非弱网，弱网]\n    'enableLazyload': true, //是否开启懒加载功能，默认true,\n    'lazyHeight': 0, //[可选]，预加载当前屏幕以下lazyHeight内的图片，默认0\n    'lazyWidth': 0, //[可选]，预加载当前屏幕右边lazyWidth内的图片，默认0\n    'enalbeIOSWifiLoadMore': false //ios&&wifi情况下 是否取消懒加载,采用一次性加载，默认false\n});\n\nvar PublicStores = {\n\n    getMsg: {\n        delItem: '套餐商品不能单独操作哦~',\n        delRelationItem: '确认删除搭配套餐所有宝贝吗？',\n        isDelItem: '确定要删除这个宝贝吗？',\n        editSku: '套餐宝贝不支持编辑哦~',\n        editSku2: '对不起，您无法修改这个宝贝',\n        empty: '您还没有选择宝贝哦~',\n        quantityPlus: '亲，该宝贝不能购买更多哦~',\n        quantityMinus: '受不了了，宝贝不能再减少了哦~',\n        quantityWarn: '超出数量范围~',\n        invalidEmpty: '确认清空失效宝贝吗？',\n        noInvalid: '无可清空的失效宝贝',\n        checkMax: '购物车最多只支持{n}个宝贝一起购买哦！',\n        serviceBusy: '小二很忙，请稍后重试'\n    },\n\n    getImgHelper: imgHelper,\n\n    getUrl: function getUrl(data, controlParas) {\n\n        var codeUrl = data.url;\n        var url = '';\n        if (codeUrl) {\n            var codeId = codeUrl.match(/\\$\\{([\\w]+)\\}/)[1];\n            url = controlParas[codeId];\n\n            url = url.replace(/\\$\\{([\\w]+)\\}/g, function (item, j) {\n                return data[j];\n            });\n        }\n\n        return url;\n    },\n    getPrice: function getPrice(num) {\n        var numArr = '';\n\n        if (isNaN(num) && num.indexOf('￥')) {\n            numArr = num.split('￥')[1];\n        }\n\n        if (!isNaN(num)) {\n            if (typeof num === 'number') {\n                num = num.toFixed(2);\n            }\n\n            numArr = num.split('.');\n            if (numArr[1]) {\n                return React.createElement(\n                    'p',\n                    { className: 'o-t-price' },\n                    React.createElement(\n                        'span',\n                        null,\n                        React.createElement(\n                            'span',\n                            { className: 'major' },\n                            numArr[0]\n                        ),\n                        React.createElement(\n                            'span',\n                            { className: 'point' },\n                            '.'\n                        ),\n                        React.createElement(\n                            'span',\n                            { className: 'minor' },\n                            numArr[1]\n                        )\n                    )\n                );\n            } else {\n                return React.createElement(\n                    'p',\n                    { className: 'o-t-price' },\n                    React.createElement(\n                        'span',\n                        { className: 'major' },\n                        numArr[0]\n                    )\n                );\n            }\n        } else {\n            return num;\n        }\n    },\n\n    sendPoint: function sendPoint(str) {\n        if (!str) {\n            return;\n        }\n    },\n    extend: function extend(target, source) {\n\n        var Obja = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(target || {}));\n        var Objb = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(source || {}));\n\n        function gui(aObj, bObj, main) {\n\n            var aObj = aObj || {};\n            var bObj = bObj || {};\n\n            for (var p in bObj) {\n                if (typeof bObj[p] === 'object') {\n                    if (!aObj[p]) {\n                        aObj[p] = bObj[p];\n                    } else {\n                        gui(aObj[p], bObj[p]);\n                    }\n                } else {\n\n                    if (bObj.hasOwnProperty(p)) {\n\n                        aObj[p] = bObj[p];\n                    }\n                }\n            }\n\n            return aObj;\n        }\n\n        var newSource = gui(Obja, Objb);\n\n        return newSource;\n    },\n    delay: function delay(duration) {\n        return new Promise(function (resolve, reject) {\n            setTimeout(resolve, duration);\n        });\n    },\n    getSpmUrl: function getSpmUrl(url, node) {\n        var link = new lib.httpurl(url);\n        try {\n            //g_SPM.spm/getParam用于获取当前 node 元素的 spm 值，追加到链接上&spm=\"xx.xx.xx.xx\"\n            //即使链接中已有 spm，这里也会覆盖掉\n            link.params[\"spm\"] = g_SPM.spm(node);\n        } catch (e) {}\n        return link.toString();\n    },\n    getLocalStorage: function getLocalStorage(localName) {\n        var local = window.localStorage;\n        var cartData = {};\n        if (local) {\n            cartData = local.getItem(localName);\n            if (cartData) {\n                try {\n                    cartData = JSON.parse(cartData);\n                } catch (err) {}\n            }\n        }\n        return cartData;\n    },\n    setLocalStorage: function setLocalStorage(localName, data) {\n        var local = window.localStorage;\n        if (local) {\n            try {\n                var cartData = {};\n                var useNick = lib.login.getUserNick();\n                cartData[useNick] = data;\n                cartData = JSON.stringify(cartData);\n                local.setItem(localName, cartData);\n            } catch (err) {}\n        }\n    }\n};\n\nmodule.exports = PublicStores;\n\n/*****************\n ** WEBPACK FOOTER\n ** ./src/js/stores/PublicStores.js\n ** module id = 14\n ** module chunks = 0\n **/\n//# sourceURL=webpack:///./src/js/stores/PublicStores.js?")},function(module,exports){eval("/**\n   PublicDataStore 购物车计算用的公共方法基地 \n*/\n'use strict';\n\nvar PublicDataStore = {\n\n    /**\n     * 获取数据-根据structure数据解析出需要的数据组 \n     structureData{\n        bundlev2Items:{//每个bundle下具体宝贝集合\n            'items' : [],//所有的非时效宝贝的id\n            'checked' : [],//选中的宝贝的id\n            'exclude' : {//每种类型下分别具体的宝贝id以及数据集合\n                'exded' : [],//所有选中宝贝已有的类型集合\n                ...\n            }\n            ...\n        },\n        structureObj:{//树形关系集合\n    \n        },\n        structure : {//structure\n    \n        }\n     }\n     * @func \n     * @param  {} \n     * @return {}\n     */\n    getStructureData: function getStructureData(pageData) {\n\n        var data = pageData['data'];\n        var hierarchy = pageData['hierarchy'];\n        var structure = hierarchy.structure;\n        var root = hierarchy.root;\n        var structure = hierarchy.structure;\n        var rootData = structure[root];\n        var rootData = {\n            'items': [],\n            'checked': [],\n            'settlement': [],\n            'cartIds': [],\n            'exclude': {\n                'exded': []\n            }\n        };\n        var obj = getHierarchyData({}, root, root, root);\n\n        var structureData = {\n            bundlev2Items: rootData,\n            structureObj: obj,\n            structure: structure\n        };\n\n        function getHierarchyData(obj, mark, parent, grandParent) {\n            var dataArr = structure[mark];\n            //console.log(mark)\n            //console.log(data['itemv2_150522675944']['fields']['checked'])\n            obj[mark] = {};\n\n            if (mark.indexOf('itemv2_') !== -1) {\n                if (rootData[grandParent] && rootData[grandParent]['items']) {\n                    rootData[grandParent]['items'].push(mark);\n                    rootData['items'].push(mark);\n                    //是否选中的items\n                    var itemData = data[mark];\n                    var id = itemData['id'];\n                    var fields = itemData['fields'];\n                    var exclude = fields['exclude'];\n                    var mutex = fields['mutex'];\n                    var settlement = fields['settlement'];\n                    var cartId = fields['cartId'];\n                    var checked = fields['checked'];\n\n                    if (checked) {\n                        rootData[grandParent]['checked'].push(mark);\n                        rootData['checked'].push(mark);\n                        rootData['settlement'].push(settlement);\n                        rootData['cartIds'].push(cartId);\n\n                        //互斥存储\n                        if (!rootData['exclude'][exclude]) {\n                            rootData['exclude']['exded'].push(exclude);\n                            rootData['exclude'][exclude] = {};\n                            rootData['exclude'][exclude][mutex] = [];\n                            rootData['exclude'][exclude]['get'] = [];\n                        } else {\n                            if (!rootData['exclude'][exclude][mutex]) {\n                                rootData['exclude'][exclude][mutex] = [];\n                            }\n                            if (!rootData['exclude'][exclude]['get']) {\n                                rootData['exclude'][exclude]['get'] = [];\n                            }\n                        }\n                        rootData['exclude'][exclude][mutex].push(itemData);\n                        if (rootData['exclude'][exclude]['get'].indexOf(mutex) === -1) {\n                            rootData['exclude'][exclude]['get'].push(mutex);\n                        }\n                    }\n                }\n            }\n\n            if (mark.indexOf('bundlev2_') !== -1) {\n                rootData[mark] = {};\n                if (!rootData[mark]['items']) {\n                    rootData[mark]['items'] = [];\n                    rootData[mark]['checked'] = [];\n                }\n            }\n\n            if (mark.indexOf('group_') !== -1) {\n                //todo\n            }\n\n            function getDataArr(dataArr) {\n                if (dataArr && dataArr.length) {\n                    var t = dataArr.map(function (d, c) {\n                        return getHierarchyData(obj[mark], d, mark, parent);\n                    });\n\n                    return t;\n                }\n            }\n\n            return getDataArr(dataArr);\n        }\n\n        return structureData;\n    },\n    /**\n     * 获取数据-获取已选中宝贝的互斥关系\n     * @func \n     * @param  {obj,arr,obj}    exclude:所有选中宝贝的分类组 例：\n            {\n                HK : {\n                    HK-107180828 : [{DATA}],\n                    HK-113496408 : [{DATA}],\n                    get : [HK-107180828,HK-113496408]\n                },\n                B : {\n                    B : [{DATA}],\n                    get : [B]\n                },\n                exded : [HK,B]\n            },\n        checkedItems:选中的item的id 例：\n            [\n                itemv2_145732480860,itemv2_145808835464\n            ],\n        pageData:data，api: \"mtop.trade.queryBag\" data返回数据里的['data'] 例：\n            data:{\n                allItemv2_1 : {\n                    fields : {\n                        title : \"\",\n                        value : \"\"\n                    },\n                    id : \"1\",\n                    tag : \"allItemv2\"\n                }\n            }\n     * @return {obj}\n     */\n    refreshMutex: function refreshMutex(pageData, exclude, checkedItems) {\n\n        var exclude = exclude || {};\n        var exded = exclude.exded;\n        var checkedItems = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(checkedItems)) || [];\n        var items = {\n            item: {\n                total: checkedItems\n            },\n            total: {},\n            special: {},\n            shop: {},\n            settlement: {\n                total: []\n            },\n            cartIds: {\n                total: []\n            },\n            specialShop: []\n        };\n\n        var _data = pageData;\n        var excludes = _data.excludes;\n        var global = excludes.global;\n        var inner = excludes.inner;\n        var innerGlobal = excludes.innerGlobal;\n        var tip = excludes.tip;\n\n        checkedItems.map(function (item) {\n            var data = pageData['data'][item];\n            var fields = data['fields'];\n            var settlement = fields.settlement;\n            var cartId = fields.cartId;\n\n            items.settlement['total'].push(settlement);\n            items.cartIds['total'].push(cartId);\n            items.total[item] = data;\n        });\n\n        //只有同店铺的同类商品才可以下单\n        React.Children.map(innerGlobal, function (exc) {\n            if (exded.indexOf(exc) !== -1) {\n                var excludeMutex = exclude[exc];\n                getMutexData(excludeMutex);\n            }\n        });\n\n        //同类商品才可以下单\n        React.Children.map(global, function (exc) {\n\n            if (exded.indexOf(exc) !== -1) {\n                if (exded.length > 1) {\n                    //非同类\n                    var excludeMutex = exclude[exc];\n                    getMutexData(excludeMutex);\n                }\n            }\n        });\n\n        //同店铺的同类商品才可以下单 同类的不同店铺不可以下单 非同类商品不同店铺也可以下单\n        for (var key in inner) {\n            var excludeMutex = exclude[key];\n            var isInnerNum = 0;\n            if (exclude[key]) {\n                React.Children.map(exclude[key]['get'], function (mutex) {\n                    if (inner[key].indexOf(mutex) !== -1) {\n                        isInnerNum++;\n                    }\n                });\n            }\n\n            if (isInnerNum >= 1) {\n                getMutexData(excludeMutex);\n            }\n        }\n\n        function getMutexData(excludeMutex) {\n            var getData = excludeMutex['get'];\n\n            getData.map(function (mutexId) {\n                var datas = excludeMutex[mutexId];\n                items['special'][mutexId] = {};\n\n                for (var i = 0; i < datas.length; i++) {\n                    var data = datas[i];\n                    var fields = data['fields'] || {};\n                    var bundleId = fields['bundleId'] || {};\n                    var shopId = 'shopv2_' + bundleId;\n                    var shopData = _data['data'][shopId] || {};\n                    var shopTitle = shopData['fields']['title'];\n                    var settlement = fields['settlement'];\n                    var cartId = fields['cartId'];\n                    var tag = data['tag'];\n                    var id = data['id'];\n                    var itemId = tag + '_' + id;\n                    var index = items.item.total.indexOf(itemId);\n\n                    if (items.total[itemId]) {\n                        delete items.total[itemId];\n                    }\n\n                    if (index !== -1) {\n                        items.item.total.splice(index, 1);\n                        items.settlement.total.splice(index, 1);\n                        items.cartIds.total.splice(index, 1);\n                    }\n\n                    if (!items.item[mutexId]) {\n                        items.item[mutexId] = [];\n                        items.settlement[mutexId] = [];\n                        items.cartIds[mutexId] = [];\n                    }\n\n                    items['special'][mutexId][itemId] = _data['data'][itemId];\n                    items['shop'][mutexId] = shopTitle;\n                    //如果已经存在 不增加了\n                    if (items.item[mutexId].indexOf(itemId) == -1) {\n                        items.item[mutexId].push(itemId);\n                    }\n                    if (items.settlement[mutexId].indexOf(itemId) == -1) {\n                        items.settlement[mutexId].push(settlement);\n                    }\n                    if (items.cartIds[mutexId].indexOf(itemId) == -1) {\n                        items.cartIds[mutexId].push(cartId);\n                    }\n                    if (items.specialShop.indexOf(mutexId) == -1) {\n                        items.specialShop.push(mutexId);\n                    }\n                }\n            });\n        }\n\n        return items;\n    },\n    /**\n     * 获取数据-获取异步请求的数据格式\n     * @func \n     * @param  {arr,str}    params:对象数组 进行操作的item的data数据,\n                            ot:操作的类型，\n                                update更改数量，\n                                deleteSomeData 删除普通商品，\n                                deleteInvalid 删除失效商品,\n                                updateItemSku  更改SKU\n                            \n     * @return {obj}\n    */\n    getAdjustData: function getAdjustData(params, ot, pageData) {\n        var that = this;\n\n        var structureData = this.getStructureData(pageData);\n        var bundlev2Items = structureData['bundlev2Items'];\n\n        var checkedItemId = bundlev2Items['checked'];\n        var _data = pageData['data'];\n\n        var paramData = {};\n        var updateData = [];\n        var deleteSomeData = [];\n        var deleteInvalid = [];\n        var updateItemSku = [];\n        var operate = {};\n\n        params.map(function (param) {\n            var fields = param;\n            var item = param.itemv2Id;\n            var bundleId = param.bundleId;\n            var bundlev2Id = 'bundlev2_' + bundleId;\n            var bundleItems = bundlev2Items[bundlev2Id] ? bundlev2Items[bundlev2Id].items : [];\n            var itemId = param.itemId;\n            var itemv2Id = param.itemv2Id;\n\n            if (ot === 'update') {\n                updateData.push(itemv2Id);\n            } else if (ot === 'deleteSome') {\n                deleteSomeData.push(itemv2Id);\n            } else if (ot === 'deleteInvalid') {\n                deleteInvalid.push(itemv2Id);\n            } else if (ot === 'updateItemSku') {\n                updateItemSku.push(itemv2Id);\n            }\n\n            //记录当前宝贝数据\n            getData([itemv2Id]);\n            //记录当前宝贝下店铺所有宝贝数据，失效宝贝无额外bundle，无数据\n            getData(bundleItems);\n        });\n\n        function getData(bundleItems) {\n\n            //得到当前宝贝店铺下的所有宝贝的itemdata\n            bundleItems.map(function (item) {\n                var data = _data[item] || {};\n                var fields = data.fields;\n                if (fields) {\n                    paramData[item] = {\n                        fields: {\n                            bundleId: fields.bundleId,\n                            cartId: fields.cartId,\n                            checked: fields.checked,\n                            itemId: fields.itemId,\n                            quantity: fields.quantity.quantity,\n                            shopId: fields.shopId,\n                            skuId: fields.sku ? fields.sku.skuId : '',\n                            valid: fields.valid\n                        }\n                    };\n                }\n            });\n        }\n\n        //得到所有选中宝贝的itemdata\n        checkedItemId.map(function (item) {\n            var data = _data[item] || {};\n            var fields = data.fields;\n            if (fields) {\n                paramData[item] = {\n                    fields: {\n                        bundleId: fields.bundleId,\n                        cartId: fields.cartId,\n                        checked: fields.checked,\n                        itemId: fields.itemId,\n                        quantity: fields.quantity.quantity,\n                        shopId: fields.shopId,\n                        skuId: fields.sku ? fields.sku.skuId : '',\n                        valid: fields.valid\n                    }\n                };\n            };\n        });\n\n        //接口参数拼写规则 必须\n        if (ot === 'update') {\n            operate.update = updateData;\n        } else if (ot === 'deleteSome') {\n            operate.deleteSome = deleteSomeData;\n        } else if (ot === 'deleteInvalid') {\n            operate.deleteInvalid = deleteInvalid;\n        } else if (ot === 'updateItemSku') {\n            operate.updateItemSku = updateItemSku;\n        }\n\n        var p = {\n            data: paramData,\n            operate: operate,\n            hierarchy: pageData['hierarchy']\n        };\n        var data = {\n            p: JSON.stringify(p),\n            extStatus: '0',\n            feature: '{\\\"gzip\\\":false}',\n            exParams: \"{\\\"mergeCombo\\\":\\\"true\\\"}\"\n        };\n\n        return data;\n    },\n    /**\n     * 医药馆下单特殊方法处理\n     * @func \n     * @param  {string,arr,arr}     obh:post actionUrl \n                                    cartIdsItem: 选中宝贝的cartIds数组\n                                    cartParams : 选中的医药馆宝贝的独有的参数数组\n      * @return {fun}\n    */\n    getYySubmit: function getYySubmit(obh, cartIdsItem, cartParams) {\n        var html = $(['' + '<form method=\"post\" action=\"' + obh + '\">' + '<input type=\"hidden\" name=\"cartId\" value=\\'' + String(cartIdsItem) + '\\'/>' + '<input type=\"hidden\" name=\"cart_param\" value=\\'{\"items\":[' + String(cartParams) + ']}\\'/>' + '</form>'].join(''));\n\n        html[0].submit();\n    },\n    /**\n     * 处理定制下单URL的跳转\n     * @func \n     * @param  {string,arr,arr}     obh:post actionUrl \n                                    cartIdsItem: 选中宝贝的cartIds数组\n                                    cartParams : 选中的医药馆宝贝的独有的参数数组\n      * @return {fun}\n    */\n    goSubmitCustomUrl: function goSubmitCustomUrl(params, itemsGroup, pageData) {\n        var structureData = this.getStructureData(pageData);\n        var bundlev2Items = structureData['bundlev2Items'];\n        var cartIds = bundlev2Items['cartIds'];\n        var checkedItems = bundlev2Items['checked'];\n\n        var itemsGroupItem = itemsGroup['item'] || {};\n        var itemsGroupCartIds = itemsGroup['cartIds'] || {};\n        var paramsItem = itemsGroupItem[params] || [];\n        var cartIdsItem = itemsGroupCartIds[params] || [];\n\n        var controlParas = pageData['controlParas'] || {};\n        var orderByH5Urls = controlParas['orderByH5Urls'] || {};\n        var obh = orderByH5Urls[params];\n        var _data = pageData['data'];\n        var cartParams = [];\n\n        if (!cartIdsItem.length && params === 'YY') {\n            paramsItem = checkedItems;\n            cartIdsItem = cartIds;\n        }\n\n        paramsItem.map(function (item) {\n            var h5Param = _data[item]['fields']['h5CartParam'];\n            cartParams.push(h5Param);\n        });\n\n        if (params === 'YY') {\n            //医药馆逻辑\n            this.getYySubmit(obh, cartIdsItem, cartParams);\n        } else {\n            location.href = obh;\n        }\n    }\n};\n\nmodule.exports = PublicDataStore;\n\n/*****************\n ** WEBPACK FOOTER\n ** window['@ali/lib-smartbanner-plus-loader'];\n\nvar injectConf = function injectConf(successCallback) {\n    if (sbLoader) {\n        sbLoader.init({\n            \"bizKey\": \"taobao\"\n        });\n\n        sbLoader.ready(function (smartbanner) {\n            if (successCallback) {\n                successCallback();\n            }\n        });\n    }\n};\nvar smartBannerHelper = {\n    injectConf: injectConf,\n    active: function active(isForce) {\n        injectConf(function () {\n            if (sbLoader) {\n                sbLoader.ready(function (smartbanner) {\n                    var sbHeight;\n                    var bizText = smartbanner.getBizText('mainDetail'); //获取文案数据，手淘首页mainIndex，mainMyTaobao我的淘宝,mainSearch搜索页，mainDetail详情页\n\n                    bizText['position'] = 'top'; //smartbanner置于顶部\n                    bizText['dpr'] = window.dpr || '';\n                    if (isForce) {\n                        smartBannerHelper.instance = smartbanner.sbLogic(bizText, 7);\n                    } else {\n                        smartBannerHelper.instance = smartbanner.sbLogic(bizText, 4);\n                    }\n\n                    var smartDom = smartBannerHelper.instance && smartBannerHelper.instance.smartDom;\n                    if (smartDom) {\n                        sbHeight = smartDom.scrollHeight;\n                        smartDom.style.zIndex = '1';\n                        //设置smartbanner占位样式\n                        // todo\n\n                        return smartBannerHelper.instance.hideCB = function () {\n                            var _base;\n                            // 关闭smartbanner 清除占位样式\n                            // todo\n                        };\n                    }\n                });\n            }\n        });\n    }\n};\n\nmodule.exports = smartBannerHelper;\n\n/*****************\n ** WEBPACK FOOTER\n ** ./src/js/stores/smartBannerHelper.js\n ** module id = 17\n ** module chunks = 0\n **/\n//# sourceURL=webpack:///./src/js/stores/smartBannerHelper.js?")},function(module,exports){eval("/**\n    公用方法库\n*/\n\n'use strict';\n\nvar imgHelper = lib.img({\n    'class': 'lazy', //图片class\n    'dataSrc': 'data-src', //图片真实src 的data字段\n    'size': '200x200', //cdn尺寸\n    'sharpen': 's150', //锐化参数\n    'q': ['q50', 'q30'], //图片质量[非弱网，弱网]\n    'enableLazyload': true, //是否开启懒加载功能，默认true,\n    'lazyHeight': 0, //[可选]，预加载当前屏幕以下lazyHeight内的图片，默认0\n    'lazyWidth': 0, //[可选]，预加载当前屏幕右边lazyWidth内的图片，默认0\n    'enalbeIOSWifiLoadMore': false //ios&&wifi情况下 是否取消懒加载,采用一次性加载，默认false\n});\n\nvar Untils = {\n\n    getMsg: {\n        delItem: '套餐商品不能单独操作哦~',\n        delRelationItem: '确认删除搭配套餐所有宝贝吗？',\n        isDelItem: '确定要删除这个宝贝吗？',\n        editSku: '套餐宝贝不支持编辑哦~',\n        editSku2: '对不起，您无法修改这个宝贝',\n        empty: '您还没有选择宝贝哦~',\n        quantityPlus: '亲，该宝贝不能购买更多哦~',\n        quantityMinus: '受不了了，宝贝不能再减少了哦~',\n        quantityWarn: '超出数量范围~',\n        invalidEmpty: '确认清空失效宝贝吗？',\n        noInvalid: '无可清空的失效宝贝',\n        checkMax: '购物车最多只支持{n}个宝贝一起购买哦！',\n        serviceBusy: '小二很忙，请稍后重试'\n    },\n\n    getImgHelper: imgHelper,\n\n    getUrl: function getUrl(data, controlParas) {\n\n        var codeUrl = data.url;\n        var url = '';\n        if (codeUrl) {\n            var codeId = codeUrl.match(/\\$\\{([\\w]+)\\}/)[1];\n            url = controlParas[codeId];\n\n            url = url.replace(/\\$\\{([\\w]+)\\}/g, function (item, j) {\n                return data[j];\n            });\n        }\n\n        return url;\n    },\n    getPrice: function getPrice(num) {\n        var numArr = '';\n\n        if (isNaN(num) && num.indexOf('￥')) {\n            numArr = num.split('￥')[1];\n        }\n\n        if (!isNaN(num)) {\n            if (typeof num === 'number') {\n                num = num.toFixed(2);\n            }\n\n            numArr = num.split('.');\n            if (numArr[1]) {\n                return React.createElement(\n                    'p',\n                    { className: 'o-t-price' },\n                    React.createElement(\n                        'span',\n                        null,\n                        React.createElement(\n                            'span',\n                            { className: 'major' },\n                            numArr[0]\n                        ),\n                        React.createElement(\n                            'span',\n                            { className: 'point' },\n                            '.'\n                        ),\n                        React.createElement(\n                            'span',\n                            { className: 'minor' },\n                            numArr[1]\n                        )\n                    )\n                );\n            } else {\n                return React.createElement(\n                    'p',\n                    { className: 'o-t-price' },\n                    React.createElement(\n                        'span',\n                        { className: 'major' },\n                        numArr[0]\n                    )\n                );\n            }\n        } else {\n            return num;\n        }\n    },\n    extend: function extend(target, source) {\n\n        var Obja = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(target || {}));\n        var Objb = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(source || {}));\n\n        function gui(aObj, bObj, main) {\n\n            var aObj = aObj || {};\n            var bObj = bObj || {};\n\n            for (var p in bObj) {\n                if (typeof bObj[p] === 'object') {\n                    if (!aObj[p]) {\n                        aObj[p] = bObj[p];\n                    } else {\n                        gui(aObj[p], bObj[p]);\n                    }\n                } else {\n\n                    if (bObj.hasOwnProperty(p)) {\n\n                        aObj[p] = bObj[p];\n                    }\n                }\n            }\n\n            return aObj;\n        }\n\n        var newSource = gui(Obja, Objb);\n\n        return newSource;\n    },\n    delay: function delay(duration) {\n        return new Promise(function (resolve, reject) {\n            setTimeout(resolve, duration);\n        });\n    },\n    getSpmUrl: function getSpmUrl(url, node) {\n        var link = new lib.httpurl(url);\n        try {\n            //g_SPM.spm/getParam用于获取当前 node 元素的 spm 值，追加到链接上&spm=\"xx.xx.xx.xx\"\n            //即使链接中已有 spm，这里也会覆盖掉\n            link.params[\"spm\"] = g_SPM.spm(node);\n        } catch (e) {}\n        return link.toString();\n    },\n    getLocalStorage: function getLocalStorage(localName) {\n        var local = window.localStorage;\n        var cartData = {};\n        if (local) {\n            cartData = local.getItem(localName);\n            if (cartData) {\n                try {\n                    cartData = JSON.parse(cartData);\n                } catch (err) {}\n            }\n        }\n        return cartData;\n    },\n    setLocalStorage: function setLocalStorage(localName, str) {\n        var local = window.localStorage;\n        if (local) {\n            try {\n                local.setItem(localName, str);\n            } catch (err) {}\n        }\n    },\n    trackLog: function trackLog(data) {\n        if (typeof data !== 'object') {\n            return;\n        }\n\n        window.JSTracker2 = window.JSTracker2 || [];\n        window.JSTracker2.push(data);\n    },\n    toast: {\n        oToast: document.querySelector('.c-pop-toast'),\n        show: 一级参数\n        newUrl.params = params;\n        newUrl.params.buyNow = params.buyNow || 'true';\n        if (params.skuId) {\n            newUrl.params.skuId = params.skuId || '';\n        }\n location.search.slice(1).match(/(qfrom_)\\w+=([^&}]+)/g);\n        if (ENV) {\n            for (var key in ENV) {\n                var qfromData = key.indexOf('qfrom_');\n                var value = ENV[key];\n                if (qfromData === 0) {\n                    var qfromDataRep = key.split('_');\n                    var qfromKey = qfromDataRep[1];\n                    params[qfromKey] = u_channel umpChannel 优惠\n        var channel = ENV['u_channel'] || ENV['umpChannel'];\n        if (channel) {\n            params['channelKey'] = channel;\n        }\n\n        // hybrid 透传\n    },\n    getGlodLog: function getGlodLog(v, t, code, act) {\n        var t = 'tab=v6&' + t;\n        var act = act || 'CLK';\n        var code = code || '';\n        try {\n 模板解析公用方法库\n*/\n\n'use strict';\n\nvar TemplateCore = {\n\n    getTrackName: function getTrackName(params) {\n        return params.trackName;\n    },\n    /*\n    * 获取模板的解析字段\n    */\n    getTempKey: function getTempKey(key, data) {\n        var keyReps = key.match(/\\$\\{([^\\}]+)\\}/g);\n        var newKey = key;\n\n        if (keyReps) {\n            for (var j = 0; j < keyReps.length; j++) {\n                var subKey = keyReps[j];\n                var keyRep = subKey.match(/\\$\\{([^\\}]+)\\}/);\n                var newSubkey = '';\n                if (keyRep) {\n                    var code = keyRep[1].replace(/empty/g, '').replace(/not/g, '').replace(/deleteIfNull/g, '').trim();\n                    var codeSplit = code.split('.');\n                    var dataKey = data;\n\n                    for (var i = 0; i < codeSplit.length; i++) {\n                        var codeStr = codeSplit[i];\n                        dataKey = dataKey[codeStr];\n                        if (!dataKey || dataKey === 'undefined') {\n                            dataKey = '';\n                            break;\n                        }\n                    }\n\n                    newSubkey = dataKey;\n                    //newKey += dataKey\n\n                    // try{\n                    //     var dataValue = eval('data.'+code)\n                    //     if(dataValue){\n                    //         newKey = dataValue\n                    //     }else{\n                    //         newKey = ''\n                    //     }\n                    // }catch(err){\n                    //     newKey = '';\n                    // }\n\n                    // 数组组不要做替换 直接返回\n                    if (typeof newSubkey === 'string') {\n                        newKey = newKey.replace(keyRep[0], newSubkey);\n                    } else {\n                        newKey = newSubkey;\n                    }\n                }\n            }\n        }\n\n        return newKey;\n    },\n    /*\n    * 获取模板的解析 字符串严谨\n    */\n    getTempKeyCodeStr: function getTempKeyCodeStr(key, data) {\n        var keyRep = key.match(/\\$\\{([^\\}]+)\\}/);\n        var newKey = null;\n        var newKeyStr = 'data';\n        var newKeyArr = data;\n\n        if (keyRep) {\n            var code = keyRep[1];\n            var codeSplit = code.split('.');\n\n            for (var i = 0; i < codeSplit.length; i++) {\n                var codeStr = codeSplit[i].trim();\n\n                newKeyStr += '.' + codeStr;\n                newKey = newKeyStr;\n            }\n\n            //newKey = newKeyArr.join(' && ')\n        }\n\n        return newKey;\n    },\n    /*\n    * 获取配置模板的参数解析字段\n    */\n    getParams: function getParams(model, data) {\n        var that = this;\n        var params = {};\n        if (model && data) {\n            for (var key in model) {\n                params[key] = that.getTempKey(model[key], data);\n            }\n        }\n        return params;\n    },\n    getOpenUrl: function getOpenUrl(params, data) {\n        var that = this;\n        var url = params.url;\n        var urlParams = params.urlParams;\n        var newUrl = new lib.httpurl(that.getTempKey(url, data));\n\n        if (urlParams) {\n            for (var p in urlParams) {\n                var urlParamsKey = urlParams[p];\n                newUrl.params[p] = that.getTempKey(urlParamsKey, data);\n            }\n        }\n        return newUrl.toString();\n    },\n    /*\n    * 获取条件参数\n    */\n    getFilterParams: function getFilterParams(filter, data) {\n        var that = this;\n        if (filter) {\n            var str = filter;\n            var filterIfs = str.replace(/empty/g, '!').replace(/not/g, '!').replace(/OR/g, '||').replace(/AND/g, '&&').replace(/\\$\\{/g, '').replace(/\\}/g, '');\n            var filterOther = str.replace(/empty/g, '').replace(/not/g, '');\n            var filterOtherRep = filterOther.match(/\\$\\{([^\\}]+)\\}/g);\n            var StorageRepeatFilterOtherRep = [];\n            for (var i = 0; i < filterOtherRep.length; i++) {\n                var strCode = filterOtherRep[i];\n                var strCodeClean = strCode.match(/\\$\\{([^\\}]+)\\}/)[1].trim();\n                var reg = new RegExp(strCodeClean, 'g');\n                var strSafeCode = that.getTempKeyCodeStr(strCode);\n                if (StorageRepeatFilterOtherRep.indexOf(strCodeClean) <= -1) {\n                    var isRepeat = false;\n                    for (var j = 0; j < StorageRepeatFilterOtherRep.length; j++) {\n                        var storageCode = StorageRepeatFilterOtherRep[j];\n                        if (strCodeClean.indexOf(storageCode) >= 0) {\n                            isRepeat = true;\n                            break;\n                        }\n                    }\n                    if (isRepeat) {\n                        continue;\n                    }\n                    filterIfs = filterIfs.replace(reg, strSafeCode);\n                    StorageRepeatFilterOtherRep.push(strCodeClean);\n                }\n            }\n\n
