              { className: 'major' },\n                        numArr[0]\n                    )\n                );\n            }\n        } else {\n            return React.createElement(\n                'p',\n                { className: 'o-t-price' },\n                React.createElement(\n                    'span',\n                    { className: 'major' },\n                    num\n                )\n            );\n        }\n    },\n\n    priceTagTemp: function priceTagTemp(priceTag) {\n        var that = this;\n        if (priceTag && priceTag.length) {\n            var oPriceTag =             d.text\n                        )\n                    );\n                }\n            });\n\n            return oPriceTag;\n        } else {\n            return null;\n        }\n     ':￥',\n                        oPrice\n                    );\n                    return res;\n                };\n                _ref1 = priceV6.extraPrices;\n\n                oExPrice = React.createElement(\n                    'div',\n                    { className: 'original-price' },\n                    _ref1.map(function (price, index) {\n                        return priceUnitRender(price, index);\n                    })\n                );\n            }\n\n            if (priceV6.priceTip) {\n                //oTip = <div      oPop.className = \"o-pop-btm hide visibility\";\n            clearTimeout(timer);\n        }, 200);\n    },\n\n    componentDidUpdate: function componentDidUpdate() {\n        //在组件的更新已经同步到 DOM     "div",\n                { className: "content" },\n                main,\n                info\n            );\n        } else {\n            content = null;\n        }\n\n        return            if (status === 'SUCCESS') {\n                    that.addCollect();\n                }\n            });\n            return;\n        }\n        MtopRequest.addCollect(params).then(function (result) {\n            var ret = result.ret[0];\n            var code = ret.split('::')[0];\n            var msg = ret.split('::')[1];\n\n            Untils.toast.show('收藏成功');\n            that.props.collect = true;\n            that.setState(that.props);\n        }, function (result) {\n            var ret = result.ret[0];\n            var code = ret.split('::')[0];\n            var msg = ret.split('::')[1];\n\n            Untils.toast.show(msg);\n\n            if (code === 'ALREADY_COLLECT') {\n                that.props.collect = true;\n                that.setState(that.props);\n            } else if (code === 'FAIL_SYS_SESSION_EXPIRED') {\n                lib.login.goLoginAsync(function (status) {\n                    // 拉起登录框（手淘中也适用）\n                    if (status === 'SUCCESS') {\n                        that.addCollect();\n                    }\n                });\n            }\n        });\n    },\n\n    delCollect: function delCollect() getPrice(num) {\n    var numArr = '';\n\n    if (isNaN(num) && num.indexOf('￥')) {\n      numArr = num.split('￥')[1];\n    }\n\n    if (!isNaN(num)) {\n      if (typeof num === 'number') {\n       var model = data.model;\n            var name = model.name;\n            var enterText = model.enterText;\n            var address = model.address;\n            var distanceText = sourceURL=webpack:///./src/js/layout/o2o.react.js?")},function(module,exports,__webpack_require__){eval("'use strict';\n\nvar AppActions = __webpack_require__(3);\nvar AppStores = __webpack_require__(9);\nvar TemplateCore = __webpack_require__(21);\nvar ActionsCore = __webpack_require__(20);\n\nvar Bottom_bar_sharegroup = React.createClass({\n  displayName: 'Bottom_bar_sharegroup',\n\n  clickHandler: function clickHandler(params, buyText) {\n    AppStores.pageData.data.buyText = buyText;\n    ActionsCore.buy_now(params);\n  },\n\n  disposeNick: function disposeNick(nick) {\n    var nickRep = nick.split('');\n    var newNick = '';\n    var nickLength = nickRep.length;\n\n    for (var i = 0; i < nickLength; i++) {\n      newNick += nickRep[i];\n      if (i == 0 && nickLength <= 3) {\n        break;\n      } else if (i >= 2) {\n        break;\n      }\n    }\n\n    newNick += '***';\n    newNick += nickRep[nickLength - 1];\n\n    return newNick;\n  },\n\n  render: function render() {\n    var data = this.props.dataInfo.data;\n    var pintuan = data && data.vertical.pintuan;\n    var strangers = pintuan && pintuan.strangers;\n    var that = this;\n    var groupSize = pintuan && +pintuan.groupSize;\n    // var nickname = this.disposeNick('xiaoshihouti');\n    var price = data.price && data.price.price && data.price.price.priceText;\n    // 团购\n    var groupBuyText = '确定（' + groupSize + '人团：¥' + price + ')';\n    function groupBuy(e) {\n      if (e.disable === 'true') return;\n\n      var params = {\n        groupId: e.groupId,\n        shareGroup: 1\n      };\n\n      that.clickHandler({\n        'exParams': JSON.stringify(params),\n        'hybrid': 'false'\n      }, groupBuyText);\n    }\n\n    if (strangers && strangers.length) && that.disposeNick(item.nickName) || '匿名用户';\n            var head = '//wwc.alicdn.com/avatar/getAvatar.do?userId=' + item.userId + '&width=40&height=40&type=sns';\n            var joinNum = 'c_s_group_time' },\n                  item.startTime\n                ),\n                React.createElement(\n                  'span',\n                  { className: 'c_s_group_people' },\n                  '还差 ',\n                  groupSize - joinNum,\n                  ' 人成团'\n                )\n              ),\n              React.createElement(\n                'div',\n                { __webpack_require__(48);\nvar RATE = React.createClass({\n    displayName: 'RATE',\n\n    rank: function rank(credit) {\n        //buyer credit\n        var rank = credit,\n            r = staticProps); return Constructor; }; })();\n\nfunction _classCallCheck(instance, Constructor) { if (!(instance instanceof Constructor)) { throw new TypeError('Cannot call a class as a function'); }      //sku文案\n            var oSkuTxt = ctEl('p');\n            var oCkSkuTxt = ctEl('span'); //选择的SKU的文案\n            var oUnCkSkuTxt = ctEl('span'); //未选择的SKU的文案\n            oSkuTxt.className = 'sku-txt';\n            oCkSkuTxt.className = 'c-sku';\n            oUnCkSkuTxt.className = 'unc-sku';\n            oCkSkuTxt.textContent = checkedSkuText;\n            oUnCkSkuTxt.textContent = skuText;\n            oSkuTxt.appendChild(oCkSkuTxt);\n            oSkuTxt.appendChild(oUnCkSkuTxt);\n\n            //sku img\n            var oSkuImgBox = ctEl('div');\n            var oSkuImgP = ctEl('p');\n            var oSkuImg = ctEl('img');\n            oSkuImgBox.className = 'sku-img';\n\n            oSkuImg.src = (that.skuImage || images[0]) + '_120x120q50s150.jpg';\n            oSkuImgP.appendChild(oSkuImg);\n            oSkuImgBox.appendChild(oSkuImgP);\n\n            //sku pro info\n            var oSkuProInfo = ctEl('div');\n            var oSkuProInfoDiv = ctEl('div');\n            var oSkuProTitle = ctEl('h3');\n            oSkuProInfo.className = 'sku-pro-info';\n            oSkuProTitle.textContent = title;\n            oSkuProTitle.className = 'sku-title';\n            oSkuProInfoDiv.appendChild(oSkuProTitle);\n            oSkuProInfoDiv.appendChild(oPrice);\n            oSkuProInfoDiv.appendChild(oQuantity);\n            oSkuProInfoDiv.appendChild(oSkuTxt);\n            oSkuProInfo.appendChild(oSkuProInfoDiv);\n\n            //sku closed\n            var oSkuClosed = ctEl('div');\n            oSkuClosed.className = 'sku-closed';\n            oSkuClosed.addEventListener('click', function () {\n                that.props.callClosedSku();\n            }, false);\n\n            //sku pro\n            var oSkuPro = ctEl('div');\n            var oSkuProDiv = ctEl('div');\n            oSkuPro.className = 'sku-pro';\n            oSkuProDiv.appendChild(oSkuImgBox);\n            oSkuProDiv.appendChild(oSkuProInfo);\n            oSkuProDiv.appendChild(oSkuClosed);\n            oSkuPro.appendChild(oSkuProDiv);\n\n            //确认按钮\n            var oSkuBtnsBox = ctEl('div');\n            var oSkuBtn = ctEl('div');\n            oSkuBtnsBox.className = 'sku-btns';\n\n            if (this.props.showBtns) {\n\n                var buyParam = trade.buyParam; //非必需，提交到下一个页面需额外传递的参数\n                var cartParam = trade.cartParam; //非必需，提交到下一个页面需额外传递的参数\n                var buyEnable = trade.buyEnable; //购物车按钮是否可用\n                var cartEnable = trade.cartEnable; //购买按钮是否可用\n                var cartText = trade.cartText || this.props.cartText || '加入购物车';\n                var buyText = trade.buyText || this.props.buyText || '立即购买';\n\n                var oSkuBtn_cart = ctEl('div');\n                oSkuBtn_cart.className = 'sku-btn addcart';\n                oSkuBtn_cart.textContent = cartText;\n                var oSkuBtn_buy = ctEl('div');\n                oSkuBtn_buy.className = 'sku-btn gobuy';\n                oSkuBtn_buy.textContent = buyText;\n\n                if (String(cartEnable) === 'true') {\n                    oSkuBtn_cart.addEventListener('click', function () {\n                        that.handlerClick('cart');\n                    }, false);\n                } else {\n                    oSkuBtn_cart.className += ' disabled none';\n                }\n\n                if (String(buyEnable) === 'true') {\n                    oSkuBtn_buy.addEventListener('click', function () {\n                        that.handlerClick('buy');\n                    }, false);\n                } else {\n                    oSkuBtn_buy.className += ' disabled none';\n                }\n\n                oSkuBtnsBox.appendChild(oSkuBtn_cart);\n                oSkuBtnsBox.appendChild(oSkuBtn_buy);\n                oSkuBtn.appendChild(oSkuBtnsBox);\n            } else {\n                var oSkuBtn = ctEl('div');\n                oSkuBtn.className = 'sku-btn';\n                oSkuBtn.textContent = '确认';\n                oSkuBtn.addEventListener('click', function () {\n                    that.handlerClick();\n                }, false);\n            }\n\n            // 区域配送\n            var oDeliveryList = this.getDeliveryListDom(data);\n            if (oDeliveryList) {\n                oSkuInfo.textContent = '';\n                oSkuInfo.appendChild(oDeliveryList);\n                oSkuBtn = null;\n            }\n\n            //ctrl sku box\n            var oCtrSku = ctEl('div');\n            oCtrSku.className = 'ctrl-ui-sku';\n            oSkuPro && oCtrSku.appendChild(oSkuPro);\n            oSkuInfo && oCtrSku.appendChild(oSkuInfo);\n            oSkuBtn && oCtrSku.appendChild(oSkuBtn);\n\n            //记录坐标\n            var ctrlUiSkuTop = 0;\n            var ctrlUiSkuInfoTop = 0;\n            if (that.el.querySelector('.ctrl-ui-sku')) {\n                ctrlUiSkuTop = that.el.querySelector('.ctrl-ui-sku').scrollTop;\n                ctrlUiSkuInfoTop = that.el.querySelector('.sku-info').scrollTop;\n            }\n\n            that.el.textContent = '';\n            oCtrSku && that.el.appendChild(oCtrSku);\n\n            //设置坐标\n            that.el.querySelector('.ctrl-ui-sku').scrollTop = ctrlUiSkuTop;\n            that.el.querySelector('.sku-info').scrollTop = ctrlUiSkuInfoTop;\n\n            //配置分期购的scroll方法\n            var oScrollBox = that.el.querySelector('.installment ul');\n            if (oScrollBox && ENV && ENV.os && ENV.os.name !== 'unknown' && lib.scroll) {\n                lib.scroll(oScrollBox, {\n                    direction: 'x'\n                }).init();\n            }\n        }\n    }, {\n        key: 'getSkuId',\n        value: function getSkuId(skuPathId) {\n            var that = this;\n            var filterFirstSkuId = [];\n            var filterSkuId = [];\n            var n = 0;\n            for (var key in skuPathId) {\n                var path = key + ':' + skuPathId[key];\n                var pathToSkuIds = that.skuIdData.skuPath[path];\n\n                if (n === 0) {\n                    filterFirstSkuId = that.skuIdData.skuPath[path];\n                } else {\n\n                    if (pathToSkuIds && pathToSkuIds.length) {\n                        for (var i = 0; i < pathToSkuIds.length; i++) {\n                            var pathToSkuId = pathToSkuIds[i];\n                            var index = filterFirstSkuId.indexOf(pathToSkuId);\n                            if (index >= 0 && filterSkuId.indexOf(pathToSkuId) === -1) {\n                                filterSkuId.push(pathToSkuId);\n                            }\n                        }\n                        if (filterFirstSkuId.length > 1) {\n                            filterFirstSkuId = filterSkuId;\n                            filterSkuId = [];\n                        }\n                    }\n                }\n                n++;\n            }\n            return filterFirstSkuId.join('');\n        }\n    }, {\n        key: 'getStartData',\n        value: function getStartData(data) {\n            var data = this.props.data;\n\n            var skuBase = data.skuBase || {};\n            var props = skuBase.props || [];\n            var skus = skuBase.skus || [];\n            var components = skuBase.components || [];\n            var services = data.services;\n            var skuVertical = data.skuVertical;\n\n            this.getSkusData(skus, props, components);\n            this.getCompnentsData(components);\n            this.getServicesData(services);\n            this.getVerticalData(skuVertical);\n        }\n\n        // 解析 sku props 的数据\n    }, {\n        key: 'getSkusData',\n        value: function getSkusData(skus, props) {\n            var that = this;\n            //解析得到 SKUID 和 pathID\n            this.skuIdData = {};\n            this.propPathData = {};\n            this.propPathPid = {};\n            if (skus.length) {\n                skus.map(function (sku) {\n                    var propPath = sku.propPath;\n                    var skuId = sku.skuId;\n                    var propPathArr = propPath.split(';');\n                    that.skuIdData[skuId] = sku.propPath;\n                    that.propPathData[sku.propPath] = sku.skuId;\n                    for (var i = 0; i < propPathArr.length; i++) {\n                        var path = propPathArr[i];\n                        if (!that.skuIdData.skuPath) {\n                            that.skuIdData.skuPath = {};\n                        }\n                        if (!that.skuIdData.skuPath[path]) {\n                            that.skuIdData.skuPath[path] = [];\n                        }\n                        that.skuIdData.skuPath[path].push(skuId);\n                    }\n                });\n            }\n\n            //解析得到 prosSkuData 的基本数据\n            this.prosSkuData = {\n                defaultAll: {},\n                convertProps: {},\n                unCheckedTxt: [],\n                checkedTxt: []\n            };\n            if (props.length) {\n                props.map(function (prop) {\n                    that.propPathPid = prop;\n                    that.prosSkuData.defaultAll[prop.pid] = prop.name;\n                    if (!that.props.skuCalData.name[prop.pid]) {\n                        that.prosSkuData.convertProps[prop.pid] = prop.name;\n                    }\n                });\n            }\n        }\n\n        // 解析 sku compents 的数据\n    }, {\n        key: 'getCompnentsData',\n        value: function getCompnentsData(components) {\n            var that = this;\n            //解析得到 components 特殊数据 存在特殊 SKU 额外创建数据\n            if (components.length) {\n                this.prosElementsData = {\n                    defaultAll: {},\n                    convertProps: {}, //还未选择的\n                    unCheckedTxt: [],\n                    checkedTxt: []\n                };\n                this.props.skuCalData.elementsName = {};\n                this.props.skuCalData.elementsId = {};\n\n                components.map(function (d) {\n                    var data = d.data ? JSON.parse(d.data) : {};\n                    var elements = data.elements || [];\n                    var key = data.key;\n                    var text = data.text;\n\n                    that.prosElementsData.defaultAll[key] = text;\n                    if (!that.props.skuCalData.elementsName[key]) {\n                        that.prosElementsData.convertProps[key] = text;\n                        elements.map(function (elt) {\n                            var selected = elt.selected;\n                            if (selected) {\n                                that.props.skuCalData.elementsName[key] = elt.text;\n                                that.props.skuCalData.elementsId[key] = elt.value;\n                                // that.prosElementsData.checkedTxt.push(elt.text);\n                                delete that.prosElementsData.convertProps[key];\n                            }\n                        });\n                    }\n                });\n            }\n        }\n\n        // 解析 sku services 的数据\n    }, {\n        key: 'getServicesData',\n        value: function getServicesData(services) {\n            var that = this;\n\n            if (services) {\n                var allServices = services.allServices || []; //所有服务列表\n                var multiSelect = services.multiSelect; //是否允许选择多选服务提交，true为是，false则表示单选\n                var mustSelect = services.mustSelect; //是否必选才能提交\n                var serviceType = services.serviceType; //服务类型，3c：电器城，house：家装，build：建材\n                var sku2serviceMap = services.sku2serviceMap;\n                var isSelect;\n\n                this.prosServicesData = {\n                    defaultAll: {},\n                    convertProps: {}, //还未选择的\n                    unCheckedTxt: [],\n                    checkedTxt: [],\n                    map: {} //sku对应的数据价格data\n                };\n                this.props.skuCalData.servicesName = {};\n                this.props.skuCalData.serviceId = {};\n\n                allServices.map(function (sd) {\n                    var autoSelect = sd.autoSelect; //当前服务是否默认选中\n                    var _mustSelect = sd.mustSelect; //当前服务是不是必选，不可取消\n                    var name = sd.name; //服务名称\n                    var serviceId = sd.serviceId; //服务id\n                    var uniqueServices = sd.uniqueServices || []; //带子服务（服务sku）信息\n\n                    that.prosServicesData.defaultAll[serviceId] = name;\n                    if (!uniqueServices.length) {\n                        if (String(autoSelect) === 'true') {\n                            isSelect = true;\n                            that.props.skuCalData.serviceId[serviceId] = '0';\n                            that.props.skuCalData.servicesName[serviceId] = name;\n                        }\n                    } else {\n                        uniqueServices.map(function (us) {\n                            var subName = us.name; //子服务名称\n                            var uniqueId = us.uniqueId; //子服务id\n                            var autoSelect = us.autoSelect; //当前服务是否默认选中\n\n                            if (String(autoSelect) === 'true') {\n                                isSelect = true;\n                                that.props.skuCalData.serviceId[serviceId] = uniqueId;\n                                that.props.skuCalData.servicesName[serviceId] = name + subName;\n                            }\n                        });\n                    }\n                });\n\n                //必须选择才能提交\n                if (!isSelect && mustSelect) {\n                    var oneServives = allServices[0];\n                    that.prosServicesData.convertProps[oneServives.serviceId] = oneServives.name;\n                }\n\n                if (sku2serviceMap && sku2serviceMap['0']) {\n                    sku2serviceMap['0'].map(function (d) {\n                        var serviceId = d.serviceId;\n                        that.prosServicesData['map'][serviceId] = d;\n                    });\n                }\n            }\n        }\n\n        // 解析 分期购 的数据\n    }, {\n        key: 'getVerticalData',\n        value: function getVerticalData(skuVertical) {\n            var that = this;\n            if (skuVertical) {\n                this.props.skuCalData.verticalId = {\n                    installment: {\n                        installmentPay: false,\n                        installmentNum: 1,\n                        installmentRate: 1\n                    }\n                };\n            }\n        }\n\n        // 解析得到 sku props 的基础数据\n    }, {\n        key: 'getBaseSkuData',\n        value: function getBaseSkuData(skuCalNames) {\n            var that = this;\n            var prosSkuData = this.prosSkuData;\n            if (prosSkuData) {\n                var convertProps = prosSkuData.convertProps;\n\n                that.prosSkuData.unCheckedTxt = [];\n                that.prosSkuData.checkedTxt = [];\n\n                if (convertProps && JSON.stringify(convertProps) !== '{}') {\n                    for (var key in convertProps) {\n                        that.prosSkuData.unCheckedTxt.push(convertProps[key]);\n                    }\n                }\n                // if (skuCalNames && JSON.stringify(skuCalNames) !== '{}') {\n                //     for (var key in skuCalNames) {\n                //         that.prosSkuData.checkedTxt.push(skuCalNames[key])\n                //     }\n                // }\n            }\n        }\n\n        // 解析得到 sku compents elements 的数据\n    }, {\n        key: 'getProsCompentsData',\n        value: function getProsCompentsData() {\n            var that = this;\n            var prosEltData = this.prosElementsData;\n            var skuCalData = this.props.skuCalData;\n            var skuCalNames = skuCalData.elementsName;\n            if (prosEltData) {\n                var convertProps = prosEltData.convertProps;\n\n                that.prosElementsData.unCheckedTxt = [];\n                that.prosElementsData.checkedTxt = [];\n\n                if (convertProps && JSON.stringify(convertProps) !== '{}') {\n                    for (var key in convertProps) {\n                        that.prosElementsData.unCheckedTxt.push(convertProps[key]);\n                    }\n                }\n                if (skuCalNames && JSON.stringify(skuCalNames) !== '{}') {\n                    for (var key in skuCalNames) {\n                        that.prosElementsData.checkedTxt.push(skuCalNames[key]);\n                    }\n                }\n            }\n        }\n\n        // 解析 sku services 的数据\n    }, {\n        key: 'getProsServicesData',\n        value: function getProsServicesData(services) {\n            var that = this;\n            var prosServicesData = this.prosServicesData;\n            var skuCalData = this.props.skuCalData;\n            var skuCalNames = skuCalData.servicesName;\n            var skuId = this.props.skuCalData.skuId;\n\n            if (!skuId) {\n                that.props.skuCalData.serviceId = {};\n                that.props.skuCalData.servicesName = {};\n                return false;\n            }\n\n            if (prosServicesData) {\n                var convertProps = prosServicesData.convertProps;\n                that.prosServicesData.unCheckedTxt = [];\n                that.prosServicesData.checkedTxt = [];\n\n                if (convertProps && JSON.stringify(convertProps) !== '{}') {\n                    for (var key in convertProps) {\n                        that.prosServicesData.unCheckedTxt.push(convertProps[key]);\n                    }\n                }\n\n                if (skuCalNames && JSON.stringify(skuCalNames) !== '{}') {\n                    for (var key in skuCalNames) {\n                        that.prosServicesData.checkedTxt.push(skuCalNames[key]);\n                    }\n                }\n            }\n\n            if (services) {\n\n                var allServices = services.allServices || []; //所有服务列表\n                var multiSelect = services.multiSelect; //是否允许选择多选服务提交，true为是，false则表示单选\n                var mustSelect = services.mustSelect; //是否必选才能提交\n                var serviceType = services.serviceType; //服务类型，3c：电器城，house：家装，build：建材\n                var sku2serviceMap = services.sku2serviceMap;\n\n                allServices.map(function (sd) {\n                    var autoSelect = sd.autoSelect; //当前服务是否默认选中\n                    var _mustSelect = sd.mustSelect; //当前服务是不是必选，不可取消\n                    var name = sd.name; //服务名称\n                    var serviceId = sd.serviceId; //服务id\n                    var uniqueServices = sd.uniqueServices || []; //带子服务（服务sku）信息\n\n                    if (!uniqueServices.length) {\n                        // if(autoSelect === 'true' && !convertProps[serviceId]){\n                        //     that.props.skuCalData.serviceId[serviceId] = '0';\n                        //     that.props.skuCalData.servicesName[serviceId] = name;\n                        // }\n                    } else {\n                            uniqueServices.map(function (us) {\n                                var subName = us.name; //子服务名称\n                                var uniqueId = us.uniqueId; //子服务id\n                                var autoSelect = us.autoSelect; //当前服务是否默认选中\n\n                                // if(autoSelect === 'true'){\n                                //     that.props.skuCalData.serviceId[serviceId] = uniqueId;\n                                //     that.props.skuCalData.servicesName[serviceId] = name+subName;\n                                // }\n                            });\n                        }\n                });\n            }\n        }\n\n        //区域限售\n    }, {\n        key: 'getDeliveryDom',\n        value: function getDeliveryDom(data) {\n            var that = this;\n\n            var skuCore = data.skuCore;\n            var skuItem = skuCore && skuCore.skuItem;\n            var showAddressTaobao = skuItem && skuItem.showAddressTaobao;\n            var showAddress = skuItem && skuItem.showAddress;\n            var delivery = data.delivery || {};\n            var areaSell = delivery.areaSell;\n            var areaId = delivery.areaId;\n            var to = delivery.to;\n            var titleTxt = to;\n            var oTitle;\n\n            if (String(showAddress) == 'true' || String(showAddressTaobao) === 'true') {\n                var oDelivery = ctEl('div');\n                var oDeliveryTitle = ctEl('h3');\n                var oDeliveryH2 = ctEl('h2');\n                oDelivery.className = 'sku-delivery';\n                oDeliveryTitle.className = 'delivery-title';\n                oDeliveryH2.textContent = '配送区域';\n                oDeliveryTitle.textContent = titleTxt;\n                oDeliveryTitle.addEventListener('click', function () {\n                    that.deliveryClick(data);\n                }, false);\n\n                oDeliveryH2 && oDelivery.appendChild(oDeliveryH2);\n                oDeliveryTitle && oDelivery.appendChild(oDeliveryTitle);\n            }\n            return oDelivery;\n        }\n\n        // 解析数据获 sku props 的 DOM 结构\n    }, {\n        key: 'getSkuInfoDom',\n        value: function getSkuInfoDom(props, sku2info, skuCalData, propPathData) {\n            var that = this;\n            var skuCalData;\n\n            var path = [];\n            var docfrag = document.createDocumentFragment();\n\n            // 获取已选择的path 判断已选择的path是否存在 并且已选择的path\n            var propPathData = that.propPathData;\n            var sku2info = that.props.data.skuCore.sku2info;\n            for (var key in skuCalData.id) {\n                var _path = key + ':' + skuCalData.id[key];\n                var _pathSKu = propPathData[_path];\n                var _sku = sku2info[_pathSKu];\n\n                if (_sku && _sku.quantity !== '0') {\n                    path.push(_path);\n                }\n            }\n\n            props.map(function (d) {\n\n                var oProps = ctEl('div');\n                var oH2 = ctEl('h2');\n                var oUl = ctEl('ul');\n                oH2.textContent = d.name;\n                oH2 && oProps.appendChild(oH2);\n                oUl && oProps.appendChild(oUl);\n\n                d.values.map(function (value) {\n                    var classed = skuCalData.id && skuCalData.id[d.pid] === value.vid ? 'sel' : 'normal';\n                    var disable = false;\n                    var mustDis = true;\n                    var str = d.pid + ':' + value.vid;\n                    var newPath = path.join(';') + ';' + str;\n\n                    var oLi = ctEl('li');\n\n                    //循环所有SKU列表path 得到存在此项的PATH项\n                    var strPath = [];\n                    for (var p in propPathData) {\n\n                        //找到存在此SKU的path选项\n                        if (p.indexOf(str) >= 0) {\n                            strPath.push(p);\n\n                            var _sku = propPathData[p] || {};\n                            var _skuData = sku2info[_sku];\n                            //判断是否改SKU项没有可选择的项\n                            if (_skuData && !(_skuData && _skuData.quantity && _skuData.quantity === '0')) {\n                                mustDis = false;\n                            }\n                        }\n                    }\n\n                    //有选择项\n                    if (skuCalData.id && JSON.stringify(skuCalData.id) !== '{}') {\n                        disable = true;\n\n                        //对比当前Path 与选中的path互斥规则\n\n                        strPath.map(function (p) {\n                            var _sku = propPathData[p] || {};\n                            var _skuData = sku2info[_sku];\n\n                            // 循环所有选择了的列表 查看当期是否和已选互斥\n                            var isDisable = true;\n                            for (var key in skuCalData.id) {\n                                var str2 = key + ':' + skuCalData.id[key];\n\n                                if (d.pid !== key) {\n                                    //console.log(value.name)\n\n                                    if (p.indexOf(str2) === -1 || !_skuData || _skuData && _skuData.quantity && _skuData.quantity === '0') {\n                                        isDisable = false;\n                                        break;\n                                    }\n                                }\n\n                                if (isDisable) {\n                                    //console.log(value.name)\n\n                                }\n                            }\n\n                            //找到符合需求的path\n                            if (isDisable) {\n                                disable = false;\n                                //break;\n                            }\n                        });\n                    }\n\n                    //同级可选择\n                    if (skuCalData.id[d.pid] && path.length === 1) {\n                        disable = false;\n                    }\n\n                    //无选择项\n                    if (mustDis) {\n                        disable = true;\n                    }\n\n                    if (disable) {\n                        oLi.className = 'disabled';\n                        oLi.textContent = value.name;\n                    } else {\n\n                        var params = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(value));\n                        params.pid = d.pid;\n\n                        oLi.className = classed;\n                        oLi.textContent = value.name;\n                        oLi.addEventListener('click', function () {\n                            that.skuCheckedHandler(params);\n                        }, false);\n\n                        // 收集选择了的skuText\n                        if (classed === 'sel') {\n                            that.prosSkuData.checkedTxt.push(value.name);\n                            if (params.image) {\n                                that.skuImage = params.image;\n                            }\n                        }\n                    }\n\n                    oUl.appendChild(oLi);\n                });\n\n                docfrag.appendChild(oProps);\n            });\n\n            return docfrag;\n        }\n\n        // 解析数据获 sku components 的 DOM 结构\n    }, {\n        key: 'getCompnentsInfoDom',\n        value: function getCompnentsInfoDom(components) {\n            var that = this;\n            var docfrag = document.createDocumentFragment();\n\n            components.map(function (d, index) {\n                var data = d.data ? JSON.parse(d.data) : {};\n                var elt = data.elements || [];\n                var key = data.key;\n                var type = data.type;\n\n                if (String(type) !== '2') {\n                    //目前只支持的类型\n                    return null;\n                }\n\n                var oCompnents = ctEl('div');\n                var oH2 = ctEl('h2');\n                var oUl = ctEl('ul');\n                oH2.textContent = data.text;\n                oCompnents.appendChild(oH2);\n                oCompnents.appendChild(oUl);\n\n                elt.map(function (elt, eq) {\n                    var changeable = elt.changeable; //是否可操作\n                    var selected = elt.selected; //是否默认选中\n                    var value = elt.value;\n                    var classed = '';\n                    var params = {\n                        value: value,\n                        key: key,\n                        text: elt.text\n                    };\n                    var elementsId = that.props.skuCalData.elementsId;\n\n                    var oLi = ctEl('li');\n\n                    if (elementsId && elementsId[key] === value) {\n                        classed = 'sel';\n                    } else if (elementsId && !elementsId[key] && selected) {\n                        classed = 'sel';\n                    } else if ((!elementsId || JSON.stringify(elementsId) === '{}') && selected) {\n                        classed = 'sel';\n                    }\n\n                    oLi.className = classed;\n                    oLi.textContent = elt.text;\n                    if (changeable) {\n                        oLi.addEventListener('click', function () {\n                            that.componentsChecked(params);\n                        }, false);\n                    }\n                    oUl.appendChild(oLi);\n                });\n\n                docfrag.appendChild(oCompnents);\n            });\n\n            return docfrag;\n        }\n\n        // 解析数据获取 sku services 的 DOM 结构\n    }, {\n        key: 'getServicesInfoDom',\n        value: function getServicesInfoDom(services, index) {\n            var that = this;\n            if (!services) {\n                return null;\n            }\n            var allServices = services.allServices || []; //所有服务列表\n            var multiSelect = services.multiSelect; //是否允许选择多选服务提交，true为是，false则表示单选\n            var mustSelect = services.mustSelect; //是否必选才能提交\n            var serviceType = services.serviceType; //服务类型，3c：电器城，house：家装，build：建材\n            var sku2serviceMap = services.sku2serviceMap;\n            var mapData = that.prosServicesData ? that.prosServicesData.map : {};\n            var skuId = this.props.skuCalData.skuId;\n            var classed = !skuId ? 'disable' : '';\n            var skuCalData = that.props.skuCalData;\n            var skuData = skuCalData.skuData;\n\n            var oServices = ctEl('div');\n            var oH2 = ctEl('h2');\n            oH2.textContent = '特色服务';\n            oServices.appendChild(oH2);\n\n            allServices.map(function (sd, index) {\n                var autoSelect = sd.autoSelect; //当前服务是否默认选中\n                var _mustSelect = sd.mustSelect; //当前服务是不是必选，不可取消\n                var name = sd.name; //服务名称\n                var serviceId = sd.serviceId; //服务id\n                var uniqueServices = sd.uniqueServices || []; //带子服务（服务sku）信息\n                var data = mapData[serviceId] || {};\n\n                var _servicesId = that.props.skuCalData.serviceId || {};\n\n                var oServicesSku = ctEl('div');\n                var oServicesSkuInfo = ctEl('div');\n\n                oServicesSku.className = \"sku_services \" + classed;\n\n                if (!uniqueServices.length) {\n                    var free = data.free;\n                    var price = data.price;\n                    var priceTxt = String(free) === 'true' || !price ? '[商家赠送]' : '￥' + price / 100;\n                    var params = sd;\n                    params._mustSelect = mustSelect;\n                    params.multiSelect = multiSelect;\n                    params.serviceType = serviceType;\n                    /**/\n                    //必选不可取消\n                    var oTitle = ctEl('h3');\n                    oTitle.textContent = name + priceTxt;\n                    if (_servicesId[serviceId]) {\n                        oTitle.className = 'cur1';\n                        if (String(_mustSelect) !== 'true') {\n                            oTitle.addEventListener('click', function () {\n                                that.servicesClick(sd);\n                            }, false);\n                        }\n                    } else {\n                        if (String(_mustSelect) === 'true' && String(autoSelect) === 'true') {\n                            oTitle.className = 'cur1';\n                        } else {\n                            oTitle.addEventListener('click', function () {\n                                that.servicesClick(sd);\n                            }, false);\n                        }\n                    }\n                    oTitle && oServicesSku.appendChild(oTitle);\n                }\n\n                uniqueServices.map(function (us, index) {\n                    var subName = us.name; //子服务名称\n                    var uniqueId = us.uniqueId; //子服务id\n                    var autoSelect = us.autoSelect; //当前服务是否默认选中\n                    var serviceSkuPrices = data.serviceSkuPrices || [];\n                    var subData = serviceSkuPrices[index] || {};\n                    var price = subData.price;\n                    var free = subData.free;\n                    var priceTxt = String(free) === 'true' || !price ? '[商家赠送]' : '￥' + price / 100;\n                    var classed;\n                    var skId = that.props.skuCalData.serviceId[serviceId];\n                    var params = us;\n                    params.serviceId = serviceId;\n                    params.name = name + subName;\n                    params._mustSelect = mustSelect;\n                    params.multiSelect = multiSelect;\n                    params.serviceType = serviceType;\n                    //自动选择\n                    if (String(autoSelect) === 'true') {\n                        classed = 'cur';\n                    }\n                    //选中\n                    if (skId === uniqueId) {\n                        classed = 'cur';\n                    }\n                    //console.log(that.props.skuCalData)\n                    var oH3 = ctEl('h3');\n                    oH3.className = classed;\n                    oH3.textContent = name + subName + priceTxt;\n                    oH3.addEventListener('click', function () {\n                        that.servicesSubClick(params);\n                    }, false);\n                    oServicesSkuInfo.appendChild(oH3);\n\n                    //return <h3 key={'services_'+serviceId+'_'+uniqueId} className={classed} onClick={that.servicesSubClick.bind(null,params)}>{name}{subName}{priceTxt}</h3>\n                });\n\n                oServicesSku.appendChild(oServicesSkuInfo);\n                oServices.appendChild(oServicesSku);\n            });\n\n            return oServices;\n        }\n\n        // 解析数据获取数量的 DOM 结构\n    }, {\n        key: 'getQuantityDom',\n        value: function getQuantityDom(skuCalData, limit) {\n            var that = this;\n            var limit = limit ? Number(limit) : undefined;\n            var quantity = Number(skuCalData.quantity || 1);\n            var skuData = this.props.skuCalData.skuData || {};\n            var minusClassed = '';\n            var plusClassed = '';\n\n            var oMinus = ctEl('p');\n            oMinus.innerHTML = '<a class=\"btn minus\"  min=\"\"></a>';\n            if (quantity > 1) {\n                oMinus.className = 'btn-minus';\n                oMinus.addEventListener('click', function () {\n                    that.minusQuantity();\n                }, false);\n            } else if (quantity <= 1) {\n                oMinus.className = 'btn-minus off';\n            }\n\n            var oPlus = ctEl('p');\n            oPlus.innerHTML = '<a class=\"btn plus\" max=\"\"></a>';\n            if (skuData.quantity && quantity >= skuData.quantity || quantity === limit) {\n                oPlus.className = 'btn-plus off';\n            } else {\n                oPlus.className = 'btn-plus';\n                oPlus.addEventListener('click', function () {\n                    that.plusQuantity();\n                }, false);\n            }\n\n            var oInputBtn = ctEl('p');\n            var oInput = ctEl('input');\n            oInputBtn.className = 'btn-input';\n            oInput.type = 'tel';\n            if (quantity <= 1 && skuData.quantity && quantity >= skuData.quantity || quantity === limit) {\n                oInput.setAttribute('value', limit || skuData.quantity);\n                oInput.setAttribute('disabled', 'disabled');\n            } else {\n                oInput.setAttribute('value', skuCalData.quantity || 1);\n                oInput.addEventListener('blur', function (e) {\n                    that.inputQuantity(e);\n                }, false);\n            }\n            oInputBtn.appendChild(oInput);\n\n            var oLimit = ctEl('span');\n            if (limit) {\n                oLimit.className = 'limit';\n                oLimit.textContent = '(每人限购' + limit + '件)';\n            }\n\n            var oQuantityInfo = ctEl('div');\n            var oQuantityInfoBox = ctEl('div');\n            var oH2 = ctEl('h2');\n            oQuantityInfo.className = 'quantity-info';\n            oQuantityInfoBox.className = 'sku-quantity';\n            oH2.textContent = '购买数量 ';\n            oH2.appendChild(oLimit);\n\n            oQuantityInfoBox.appendChild(oH2);\n            oQuantityInfoBox.appendChild(oMinus);\n            oQuantityInfoBox.appendChild(oInputBtn);\n            oQuantityInfoBox.appendChild(oPlus);\n\n            oQuantityInfo.appendChild(oQuantityInfoBox);\n\n            return oQuantityInfo;\n        }\n\n        //分期购\n    }, {\n        key: 'getSkuVerticalDom',\n        value: function getSkuVerticalDom(data, priceText) {\n            var that = this;\n            var skuVertical = data.skuVertical || {};\n            var installment = skuVertical.installment || {};\n            var sku2installment = installment.sku2Installment;\n            var enable = installment.enable;\n            var skuId = this.props.skuCalData.skuId;\n            var classed = !skuId ? 'disable' : '';\n            var verticalId = this.props.skuCalData.verticalId || {};\n\n            //尾款分期\n            if (sku2installment) {\n                if (!skuId) {\n                    priceText = sku2installment['0'];\n                    priceText = Number(priceText) / 100;\n                } else if (skuId && sku2installment[skuId]) {\n                    priceText = sku2installment[skuId];\n                    priceText = Number(priceText) / 100;\n                }\n            }\n\n            if (String(enable) === 'true') {\n                var title = installment.title;\n                var period = installment.period || [];\n                var installmentData = verticalId.installment || {};\n\n                var leng = period.length;\n                var d_w = 280 + 18;\n                var w = d_w / 75 * leng + 'rem';\n\n                if (!lib.flexible) {\n                    w = d_w / 2 * leng + 'px';\n                }\n\n                var oInstallment = ctEl('div');\n                var oInstallmentBox = ctEl('div');\n                var oH2 = ctEl('h2');\n                var oUl = ctEl('ul');\n                oInstallment.className = \"installment \" + classed;\n                oUl.style.width = w;\n                oH2.textContent = title;\n                oInstallmentBox.appendChild(oH2);\n\n                period.map(function (d) {\n                    var count = Number(d.count || 1); //分期数\n                    var ratio = Number(d.ratio || 1); //汇率\n                    var price = Number(priceText) || 0;\n                    var newPrice = (price / count + price / count * ratio).toFixed(2);\n                    var cur = String(installmentData.installmentPay) === 'true' && installmentData.installmentNum === d.count ? 'sel' : '';\n\n                    var oLi = ctEl('li');\n                    oLi.innerHTML = '<p>分' + count + '期(' + (ratio > 0 ? '含手续费' : '0手续费') + ')</p>' + '<p>￥' + newPrice + '/期</p>';\n\n                    if (skuId) {\n                        oLi.className = cur;\n                        oLi.addEventListener('click', function () {\n                            that.installmentClick(d);\n                        });\n                    }\n                    oUl.appendChild(oLi);\n                });\n\n                oInstallmentBox.appendChild(oUl);\n                oInstallment.appendChild(oH2);\n                oInstallment.appendChild(oInstallmentBox);\n\n                return oInstallment;\n            }\n        }\n\n        // 区域配送\n    }, {\n        key: 'getDeliveryListDom',\n        value: function getDeliveryListDom(data) {\n            var that = this;\n\n            var skuCore = data.skuCore;\n            var skuItem = skuCore && skuCore.skuItem;\n            var showAddressTaobao = skuItem && skuItem.showAddressTaobao;\n            var showAddress = skuItem && skuItem.showAddress;\n            var type = String(showAddress) == 'true' ? 'B' : String(showAddressTaobao) === 'true' ? 'C' : '';\n\n            var item = data.item || {};\n            var itemId = item.itemId;\n            var delivery = data.delivery || {};\n            var areaSell = delivery.areaSell;\n            var areaId = delivery.areaId;\n            var to = delivery.to;\n            var oListTitle;\n            var oList;\n            var oListTitle;\n            var prosDeliveryData = that.prosDeliveryData;\n            var titleTxt = to;\n            var oTitle, oDeliveryList;\n            var showDelivery = that.props.skuCalData.deliveryShow;\n\n            if (String(showAddress) == 'true' || String(showAddressTaobao) === 'true') {\n                var closedNewDetail = that.props.skuCalData.closedNewDetail;\n\n                if (prosDeliveryData && !closedNewDetail) {\n                    var _data = prosDeliveryData.data || {};\n                    var name = prosDeliveryData.name;\n                    var subName = prosDeliveryData.subName;\n                    var stepName = prosDeliveryData.stepName;\n\n                    var deliveryData = _data[name];\n                    if (showDelivery) {\n                        if (deliveryData && !subName) {\n                            var branches = deliveryData.branches || [];\n                            oList = document.createDocumentFragment();\n                            branches.map(function (d) {\n                                var branches = d.branches || [];\n                                var text = d.text;\n                                var query = d.query;\n                                var leaf = d.leaf;\n                                var list;\n                                var params = {\n                                    itemId: itemId,\n                                    query: query,\n                                    leaf: leaf,\n                                    name: text,\n                                    type: type\n                                };\n\n                                if (branches.length) {\n                                    that.prosDeliveryData.data[query] = d;\n                                }\n\n                                var oH4 = ctEl('h4');\n                                oH4.textContent = text;\n                                oH4.addEventListener('click', function () {\n                                    that.deliverySubClick(params);\n                                }, false);\n                                oList.appendChild(oH4);\n                                //return <h4 onClick={that.deliverySubClick.bind(null,params)}>{text}</h4>\n                            });\n                        }\n                    } else if (subName) {\n                            var name = prosDeliveryData.name;\n                            var subName = prosDeliveryData.subName;\n                            var areaId = subName || name;\n                            var params = {\n                                areaId: areaId\n                            };\n                            that.getNewDetailQuery(params);\n                        }\n\n                    titleTxt = stepName.join(' ');\n\n                    if (titleTxt) {\n                        oListTitle = ctEl('div');\n                        oListTitle.className = 'delivery-nav';\n                        oListTitle.innerHTML = '<h4>已选：' + stepName.join('>') + '</h4>';\n                        oListTitle.addEventListener('click', function () {\n                            that.deliveryBackward(data);\n                        }, false);\n\n                        //oListTitle = <div className=\"delivery-nav\" onClick={that.deliveryBackward.bind(null,data)}><h4>{stepName.join('>')}</h4></div>\n                    }\n                }\n\n                if (oList || oListTitle) {\n                    oDeliveryList = ctEl('div');\n                    var oDeliveryInfo = ctEl('div');\n                    var oH3 = ctEl('h3');\n                    var oSpan = ctEl('span');\n                    oDeliveryList.className = 'delivery-list';\n                    oDeliveryInfo.className = 'delivery-info';\n                    oList && oDeliveryInfo.appendChild(oList);\n\n                    oSpan.className = 'closed';\n                    oSpan.addEventListener('click', function () {\n                        that.deliveryClosed();\n                    }, false);\n\n                    oH3.className = 'delivery-title';\n                    oH3.textContent = '以下区域有售';\n                    oH3.appendChild(oSpan);\n\n                    oDeliveryList.appendChild(oH3);\n                    oListTitle && oDeliveryList.appendChild(oListTitle);\n                    oDeliveryList.appendChild(oDeliveryInfo);\n                }\n            }\n\n            return oDeliveryList;\n        }\n\n        // toast\n    }, {\n        key: 'Toast',\n        value: function Toast() {\n            return {\n                oToast: document.querySelector('.sku-toast'),\n                show: function show(str) {\n                    var that = this;\n                    var timer;\n                    if (that.oToast) {\n                        that.oToast.style.display = 'block';\n                        that.oToast.querySelector('div').textContent = str;\n                    } else {\n                        var toast = document.createElement('div');\n                        var cont = document.createElement('div');\n                        toast.className = 'sku-toast';\n                        cont.textContent = str;\n                        toast.appendChild(cont);\n                        document.body.appendChild(toast);\n                        that.oToast = toast;\n                    }\n\n                    timer = setTimeout(function () {\n                        clearTimeout(timer);\n                        that.oToast.style.display = \"none\";\n                    }, 2000);\n                }\n            };\n        }\n\n        // mtop\n    }, {\n        key: 'mtopRequest',\n        value: function mtopRequest() {\n            return {\n                getDetail: function getDetail(data) {\n                    var that = this;\n                    var params = ENV.params || {};\n                    var paramsData = data || {};\n                    paramsData.exParams = JSON.stringify(params);\n\n                    that.ttid = params.ttid;\n                    var ttid = '2016@taobao_h5_1.0.0'; //极简\n                    if (!navigator.onLine) {\n                        that.onLineErr();\n                    } else {\n                        return MTOP.request({\n                            'api': config.data.getdetail.name,\n                            'v': config.data.getdetail.version,\n                            'data': paramsData,\n                            'ttid': ttid,\n                            'isSec': \"0\",\n                            'ecode': \"0\",\n                            'AntiFlood': true,\n                            'AntiCreep': true,\n                            'H5Request': true\n                        });\n                    }\n                },\n\n                getAddCart: function getAddCart(params) {\n                    var that = this;\n                    if (!navigator.onLine) {\n                        that.onLineErr();\n                    } else {\n                        return MTOP.request({\n                            'api': 'mtop.trade.addBag',\n                            'v': '3.0',\n                            'data': params,\n                            'ttid': ENV.ttid,\n                            'isSec': \"0\",\n                            'ecode': \"1\",\n                            'AntiFlood': true,\n                            'AntiCreep': true,\n                            'H5Request': true,\n                            'LoginRequest': true\n                        });\n                    }\n                },\n                getArealistB: function getArealistB(params) {\n                    var that = this;\n                    if (!navigator.onLine) {\n                        that.onLineErr();\n                    } else {\n                        return MTOP.request({\n                            'api': 'com.taobao.detail.arealist',\n                            'v': '1.0',\n                            'data': params,\n                            'isSec': \"0\",\n                            'ecode': \"0\",\n                            'H5Request': true\n                        });\n                    }\n                },\n                getArealistC: function getArealistC(params) {\n                    var that = this;\n                    if (!navigator.onLine) {\n                        that.onLineErr();\n                    } else {\n                        return MTOP.request({\n                            'api': 'com.taobao.detail.c.arealist',\n                            'v': '1.0',\n                            'data': params,\n                            'isSec': \"0\",\n                            'ecode': \"0\",\n                            'H5Request': true\n                        });\n                    }\n                },\n                onLineErr: function onLineErr() {\n                    return new Promise(function (resolve, reject) {\n                        reject({\n                            ret: ['NETWORK_FAIL::网络连接失败'],\n                            data: {}\n                        });\n                    });\n                }\n            };\n        }\n\n        //重新获取详情接口\n    }, {\n        key: 'getNewDetailQuery',\n        value: function getNewDetailQuery(params) {\n            var that = this;\n\n            params.itemNumId = that.itemId;\n\n            //请求数据\n            that.MtopRequest.getDetail(params).then(function (response) {\n                var data = response.data;\n                that.props.data = data;\n                that.props.skuCalData.closedNewDetail = true;\n                that.setState(that.props.data);\n            }, function (json) {\n                var ret = json.ret[0];\n                var msg = ret.split('::')[1];\n                that.toast.show(msg);\n                // that.setErrData(msg);\n            })['catch'](function () {\n                that.toast.show('请求出错，请稍后重试');\n                //this.setErrData();\n            });\n        }\n\n        //events\n        // 数量+\n    }, {\n        key: 'plusQuantity',\n        value: function plusQuantity() {\n            var quantity = this.props.skuCalData.quantity;\n            if (!quantity || isNaN(quantity)) {\n                this.props.skuCalData.quantity = 1;\n            }\n            this.props.skuCalData.quantity++;\n            var value = this.props.skuCalData.quantity;\n            this.getQuantity(value);\n        }\n\n        // 手动设置数量\n    }, {\n        key: 'inputQuantity',\n        value: function inputQuantity(e) {\n            var value = e.target.value;\n\n            this.getQuantity(value);\n        }\n\n        //数量-\n    }, {\n        key: 'minusQuantity',\n        value: function minusQuantity() {\n            var quantity = this.props.skuCalData.quantity;\n            if (!quantity || isNaN(quantity)) {\n                this.props.skuCalData.quantity = 1;\n            }\n\n            if (quantity > 1) {\n                this.props.skuCalData.quantity--;\n                var value = this.props.skuCalData.quantity;\n                this.getQuantity(value);\n            }\n        }\n\n        //计算数量 并且设置值\n\n    }, {\n        key: 'getQuantity',\n        value: function getQuantity(value) {\n            var quantity = this.props.skuCalData.quantity;\n            var skuId = this.props.skuCalData.skuId;\n            var skuData = this.props.skuCalData.skuData || {};\n            var _value = !isNaN(value) ? Number(value).toFixed(0) : 1;\n            var _quantity = Number(skuData.quantity || 1);\n            var limit = skuData.limit;\n\n            //当quantity不存在，设置最小值1；\n            if (!quantity || isNaN(quantity)) {\n                this.props.skuCalData.quantity = 1;\n            }\n\n            if (isNaN(value)) {\n                //输出值非正常数字，取原来的值\n                _value = this.props.skuCalData.quantity;\n            } else if (skuId && skuData.quantity && _value > _quantity) {\n                //当输入的数量大于库存，取最大值；\n                _value = _quantity;\n            } else if (_value < 1) {\n                _value = 1;\n            }\n\n            //限购\n            if (limit) {\n                limit = Number(limit);\n                //库存大于限购\n                if (_quantity > limit && _value > limit) {\n                    _value = limit;\n                }\n            }\n\n            this.props.skuCalData.quantity = _value;\n            this.setState(this.props.skuCalData);\n        }\n\n        // 点击确认 判断 sku 选择情况 并且传值出去\n    }, {\n        key: 'handlerClick',\n        value: function handlerClick(handlerType) {\n            var that = this;\n            var skuCalData = this.props.skuCalData;\n            var ids = skuCalData.id;\n            var unCheckedTxt = this.prosSkuData && this.prosSkuData.unCheckedTxt;\n            var prosElementsData = this.prosElementsData;\n            var prosServicesData = this.prosServicesData;\n            var elementsId = skuCalData.elementsId;\n            var serviceId = skuCalData.serviceId;\n            var verticalId = skuCalData.verticalId;\n\n            var skuData = skuCalData.skuData;\n            var quantity = skuData && skuData.quantity;\n\n            if (unCheckedTxt && unCheckedTxt.length) {\n                that.toast.show('请选择' + unCheckedTxt.join(' '));\n            } else if (prosElementsData && prosElementsData.unCheckedTxt && prosElementsData.unCheckedTxt.length) {\n                that.toast.show('请选择' + prosElementsData.unCheckedTxt.join(' '));\n            } else if (prosServicesData && prosServicesData.unCheckedTxt && prosServicesData.unCheckedTxt.length) {\n                that.toast.show('请选择' + prosServicesData.unCheckedTxt.join(' '));\n            } else if (quantity && quantity === '0') {\n                that.toast.show('库存不足');\n            } else {\n                var checkedId = [];\n                for (var key in ids) {\n                    checkedId.push(key + ':' + ids[key]);\n                }\n\n                var path = checkedId.join(';');\n                var sku = this.getSkuId(ids); //this.propPathData && this.propPathData[path];\n                var quantity = this.props.skuCalData.quantity || 1;\n\n                var params = {\n                    data: {\n                        skuId: sku || '',\n                        quantity: quantity,\n                        itemId: that.itemId\n                    },\n                    exParams: {},\n                    path: path\n                };\n\n                if (!sku) {\n                    delete params.data.skuId;\n                }\n\n                if (skuCalData.areaId) {\n                    params.exParams.divisionId = skuCalData.areaId;\n                }\n\n                //合并elements的数据\n                if (elementsId) {\n                    for (var key in elementsId) {\n                        params.exParams[key] = elementsId[key];\n                    }\n                }\n\n                //合并分期购的数据\n                if (verticalId) {\n                    var installment = verticalId.installment;\n                    if (installment && installment.installmentPay) {\n                        params.exParams.installmentPay = installment.installmentPay;\n                        params.exParams.installmentNum = installment.installmentNum;\n                        params.exParams.installmentRate = installment.installmentRate;\n                    }\n                }\n\n                //合并 service 的数据\n                if (serviceId && JSON.stringify(serviceId) !== '{}') {\n                    var serviceIds = [];\n                    for (var key in serviceId) {\n                        serviceIds.push(key + '|' + serviceId[key]);\n                    }\n                    params.data.serviceId = serviceIds.join('-');\n                }\n\n                //合并透传参数\n                if (handlerType === 'cart') {\n                    params.exParams = extend(params.exParams, this.props.data.cartParam);\n                } else if (handlerType === 'buy') {\n                    params.data.buyNow = 'true';\n                    params.exParams = extend(params.exParams, this.props.data.buyParam);\n                }\n\n                //点击类型\n                params.handlerType = handlerType;\n\n                this.props.callBack && this.props.callBack(params);\n            }\n        }\n\n        // sku 点击选择和取消\n    }, {\n        key: 'skuCheckedHandler',\n        value: function skuCheckedHandler(params) {\n\n            var pid = params.pid;\n            var vid = params.vid;\n            var name = params.name;\n            var image = params.image;\n\n            if (image) {\n                this.props.skuCalData.image = image;\n            }\n            if (!this.props.skuCalData.id) {\n                this.props.skuCalData.id = {};\n            }\n            if (!this.props.skuCalData.name) {\n                this.props.skuCalData.name = {};\n            }\n\n            if (this.props.skuCalData.id[pid] === vid) {\n                delete this.props.skuCalData.id[pid];\n                delete this.props.skuCalData.name[pid];\n                //delete this.prosSkuData.checkProps[pid];\n\n                this.prosSkuData.convertProps[pid] = this.prosSkuData.defaultAll[pid];\n                if (image) {\n                    delete this.props.skuCalData.image;\n                }\n            } else {\n                this.props.skuCalData.id[pid] = vid;\n                this.props.skuCalData.name[pid] = name;\n                //this.prosSkuData.checkProps[pid]= name;\n\n                delete this.prosSkuData.convertProps[pid];\n            }\n\n            this.setState(this.props.skuCalData);\n        }\n\n        // sku components 点击选择和取消\n    }, {\n        key: 'componentsChecked',\n        value: function componentsChecked(params) {\n            var key = params.key;\n            var value = params.value;\n            var text = params.text;\n\n            if this.props.skuCalData.elementsName = {};\n            }\n\n            this.props.skuCalData.elementsId[key] = value;\n            this.props.skuCalData.elementsName[key] = text;\n            delete && this.props.skuCalData.serviceId[serviceId];\n            if (ckId) {\n                delete this.props.skuCalData.serviceId[serviceId];\n                delete                });\n                } else {\n                        that.setState(that.props.skuCalData);\n                    }\n            }\n        }\n    }, {\n        key: 'deliveryBackward',\n        value: function deliveryBackward(data) {\n            this.prosDeliveryData.stepId.pop();\n            this.prosDeliveryData.stepName.pop();\n            this.prosDeliveryData.subName = ''; //清除子类\n            this.prosDeliveryData.name = this.prosDeliveryData.stepId[this.prosDeliveryData.stepId.length - 1];\n\n            //默认值\n            if (!this.prosDeliveryData.stepId.length) {\n                this.prosDeliveryData.name = 'default';\n            }\n            this.setState(this.props.skuCalData);\n        }\n    }, {\n        key:       var query = data.query;\n            var leaf = data.leaf;\n            var itemId = data.itemId;\n            var name = data.name;\n            var type = data.type;\n            var          };\n\n            if (String(leaf) === 'true') {\n                //最后一级\n                var subName = that.prosDeliveryData.subName;\n                that.prosDeliveryData.subName = query;\n\n                if (subName) {\n                    that.prosDeliveryData.stepId.pop();\n                    that.prosDeliveryData.stepName.pop();\n                }\n\n that.prosDeliveryData.stepName.push(name);\n                    that.props.skuCalData.deliveryShow = true;\n\n                    that.setState(that.props.skuCalData);\n                });\n that.props.skuCalData.deliveryShow = true;\n                that.setState(that.props.skuCalData);\n            }\n        }\n\n        //分期购\n    }, {\n        key: 'installmentClick',\n        value: self(destination, source) {\n        for (var property in source) {\n            if (source.hasOwnProperty(property)) {\n\n                // 若sourc[property]是对象，则递归\n                if (_isObject(source[property])) {\n\n                    // 若destination没有property，赋值空对象\n                    if (!destination.hasOwnProperty(property)) {\n                        destination[property]                  destination[property] = source[property];\n                }\n                ;\n            }\n        }\n    };\n\n    extend = function () {\n        var arr = arguments,\n '-ms-' + k + ':' + v + ';' + '-o-' + k + ':' + v + ';' + k + ':' + v + ';';\n}\nfunction keyframes(n, v) {\n    return '@-webkit-keyframes ' + n + '{' + v + '}' + '@-moz-keyframes ' + n + '{' + v + '}' + '@-ms-keyframes ' + n + '{' + v + '}' + '@-o-keyframes ' + n + '{' + v + '}' + '@keyframes ' + n + '{' + v + '}';\n}\n\nmodule.exports = Loading;\n\n/*****************\n ** WEBPACK FOOTER\n **   <script type="text/javascript">(function(i,h){if(!h||!h.mtop||h.mtop.ERROR){return}if(!window.UA_Opt){var j=new Object;j.SendMethod=9;j.FormId="login_submit_form";j.ExTarget=["password"];j.LogVal="ua";window[j.LogVal]="";j.Token=new Date().getTime()+":"+Math.random();j.MaxMCLog=8;j.MaxKSLog=8;j.MaxMPLog=8;j.MaxTCLog=8;j.MaxFocusLog=8;j.ResHost="aeu.alicdn.com";j.Flag=1601742;window.UA_Opt=j}if(typeof(window.acjs)=="undefined"){var f=document.createElement("script");f.src="//aeu.alicdn.com/js/uac.js";f.async=true;f.onerror=function(){window.UA_Opt=false};document.body.appendChild(f)}function g(c){var b=window.UA_Opt;var d=this.options;if(b){try{d.querystring.ua=window[b.LogVal];b.Token=new Date().getTime()+":"+Math.random();b.reload&&b.reload()}catch(a){}}c()}h.mtop.middlewares.push(g)})(window,window.lib||(window.lib={}));</script>
